T03D3792:1b-1: bha ga b'an ratna gu na sanytsa ya g'a th'a n'a ma panydzi k'a /
T03D3792:1b-3: bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin po che sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba /
T03D3792:1b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang [dd] chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

T03D3792:1b-6: dngos po brgyad kyi de nyid rim pa yang dag gsal bar bshad pa gang yin pa //
T03D3792:1b-7: sems can rnams kyis rtogs par bya phyir rab dbye yang dang yang gsungs rgyal yum la //
T03D3792:1b-8: phyag 'tshal nas ni blo dman rnams la phan pa bskyed phyir ding 'dir yang dag bshad par bya //
T03D3792:1b-9: spros pas gsungs pa go ba'i sems can rgyas pa
T03D3792:1b-10: la dga' bas khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3792:1b-11: rab tu dbye ba spros nas mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3792:1b-12: brgyad gsal bar byed pa'i yum stong phrag brgya ba'i
T03D3792:1b-13: don thams cad nye bar bsdus pa'i dgos pa ni
T03D3792:1b-14: nyan pa pos gsal bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3792:1b-15: dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa la mngon par zhen
T03D3792:1b-16: pa'i sems can la rjes su brtse bar dgongs pa'i
T03D3792:1b-17: dang / phyir dang / tshigs su bcad pa sbyar
T03D3792:1b-18: ba la bdag nyid mnga' brnyes par shes par bya
T03D3792:1b-19: dang / phyir dang / ba'i phyir dang / legs
T03D3792:1b-20: par sbyar ba dang legs par sbyar ba ma yin
T03D3792:2a-1: mngon par zhen pa dgag pa sngon du 'gro bas
T03D3792:2a-2: tshad mas gnod pa med pa'i skyes bu'i don tsam
T03D3792:2a-3: la nye bar sbyor ba'i brda'i dbang gis sgra gzhan
T03D3792:2a-4: gyis kyang mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:2a-5: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rin po
T03D3792:2a-6: che bsdus pa'i ngo bo tsam phyogs gcig tu thams
T03D3792:2a-7: cad kyi tha mar gyur ba'i le'u bcom ldan 'das
T03D3792:2a-8: kyis yul dbus kyi skad kyis tshigs su bcad pas
T03D3792:2a-10: de bas na blo dman pa rjes su gzung ba'i
T03D3792:2a-11: phyir 'brel pa la sogs pa tha dad par bstan
T03D3792:2a-12: pa'i phyir so sor brgyad stong par brjod na 'dir
T03D3792:2a-14: de la 'brel pa dang por bstan par brjod de /
T03D3792:2a-15: sgrub par byed pa bstan bcos dang /
T03D3792:2a-16: dgos pa sgrub par byed pa dang /
T03D3792:2a-17: sgrub par byed pa ngo bo'i mtshan nyid du gyur par bstan te /
T03D3792:2a-18: de yang dgos pa brjod pa nyid kyis bstan pa yin te /
T03D3792:2a-19: 'di ltar 'di'i dgos pa yin no zhes ston pa
T03D3792:2a-20: pos bstan par gyur pa ni 'di'i sgrub par byed
T03D3792:2a-21: pa yin pas 'brel pa logs shig tu brjod par
T03D3792:2a-22: mi bya'o // mngon par rtogs pa brgyad 'dus pa'i
T03D3792:2a-23: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni brjod par
T03D3792:2a-25: 'das ma thag tu bstan pa'i brjod par bya ba
T03D3792:2a-26: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3792:2a-27: stong phrag brgya ba'i mdo'i don sngar bshad pa'i sems
T03D3792:2a-28: can gyis mdor bsdus pas bde blag tu rtogs par
T03D3792:2a-29: bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma yon tan rin
T03D3792:2a-30: po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa bcom ldan
T03D3792:2a-31: 'das kyi bstan pa rgyud la rtogs pa gnas pa
T03D3792:2a-32: ste / ma lus par bsdus pa'i don bde blag
T03D3792:2a-33: tu khong du chud pa ni bya ba'i 'bras bu
T03D3792:2a-34: thun mong ma yin pa'i dgos pa'o //
T03D3792:2a-35: ji skad bstan pa nyid kyi brjod par bya ba
T03D3792:2a-36: nyan thos la sogs pas ma rtogs pa bcom ldan
T03D3792:2a-37: 'das ma tshogs chung ngus thos pa'i shes rab kyis
T03D3792:2a-38: nges par byas nas dran pa'i shes pa la gzhag
T03D3792:2a-39: ste bsam pa'i shes rab kyis gtan la phab nas
T03D3792:2a-40: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis rnam pa
T03D3792:2a-41: thams cad mngon sum du mdzad pa ni rjes su
T03D3792:2a-42: mthun pa'i thabs kyi bya ba'i 'bras bu dgos pa'i
T03D3792:2a-45: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03D3792:2a-46: ston pas 'di las bshad pa gang //
T03D3792:2a-47: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te //
T03D3792:2b-0: blo dang ldan pas rtogs @2b 'gyur zhes //
T03D3792:2b-1: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
T03D3792:2b-2: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
T03D3792:2b-3: bde blag tu ni rtogs 'gyur ba //
T03D3792:2b-4: rtsom pa yi ni dgos pa yin //
T03D3792:2b-6: de la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i skabs bsam par bya ste /
T03D3792:2b-11: gang dag dang lhan cig mdo sde rin po che khyod kyis thos zhes 'dri ba rnams la /
T03D3792:2b-12: lan du bdag nyid tshad mar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
T03D3792:2b-16: 'khor rnams kyi tshogs la bstan pa ni gtso bo'i rgyu ste gleng gzhi yin no //
T03D3792:2b-17: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi
T03D3792:2b-18: grong khyer chen po'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
T03D3792:2b-19: la dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs su
T03D3792:2b-20: bskor te chos ston cing bzhugs pa de'i tshe bcom
T03D3792:2b-21: ldan 'das la gnas de nyid du 'khor rnams dang
T03D3792:2b-22: lhan cig tu bdag gis mdo sde rin po che
T03D3792:2b-23: thos so zhes sdud par byed pas 'jig rten pa'i
T03D3792:2b-24: tha snyad kyi rjes su zhugs te /
T03D3792:2b-25: gdul bya rnams gus par nyan pa dang /
T03D3792:2b-26: sems pa la sogs pa'i don du /
T03D3792:2b-27: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong phrag brgya pa'i rtsom par gsungs pa de 'dir yang gzung bar bya'o //
T03D3792:2b-28: mdo don smra bar 'dod pa yis //
T03D3792:2b-29: dgos pa bsdus pa'i don bcas dang //
T03D3792:2b-30: tshig don bcas dang mtshams sbyar bcas //
T03D3792:2b-31: rgal lan bcas pas bsnyad par bya //
T03D3792:2b-32: zhes rigs pa brjod pa de kho na dgos pa yin te /
T03D3792:2b-33: nyan pa po'i skye bo rnams kyis mdo'i don 'phyang
T03D3792:2b-34: ba med par rnam par phye ba rtogs par bya
T03D3792:2b-35: ba'i phyir dang / 'chad pa po bde blag tu
T03D3792:2b-36: bshad sla bar bya ba'i phyir re zhig bsdus pa'i
T03D3792:2b-38: de la sangs rgyas nyid don du gnyer ba'i byang
T03D3792:2b-39: chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rnam
T03D3792:2b-40: pa thams cad yongs su shes pa'i don du dang
T03D3792:2b-41: por 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3792:2b-42: bstan te / dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer gzhag ste //
T03D3792:2b-44: chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa //
T03D3792:2b-45: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
T03D3792:2b-46: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:2b-47: de yang nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam yongs su
T03D3792:2b-48: shes pa med par med pas lam shes pa nyid
T03D3792:3a-1: gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor la mi gnas shing //
T03D3792:3a-3: thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa //
T03D3792:3a-4: nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med dpyad du med //
T03D3792:3a-5: ces bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3a-6: de yang dngos po thams cad yongs su shes pa
T03D3792:3a-7: med par ma yin pas de'i rjes la thams cad
T03D3792:3a-8: shes pa nyid bstan pa ni /
T03D3792:3a-9: dpa' bo gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis //
T03D3792:3a-11: nyi ma sgra gcan gza' bral lhang nger 'dug pa dang //
T03D3792:3a-12: me btang rtsva dang shing dang nags tshal bsregs pa bzhin //
T03D3792:3a-13: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3a-14: de nas rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen
T03D3792:3a-15: pa nyid gsum thob pa dbang du bya ba'i phyir
T03D3792:3a-16: yang rnam pa thams cad dang /
T03D3792:3a-18: dngos po shes pa'i rnam pa rnams bsdus nas thams
T03D3792:3a-19: cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum bsgom pa ni rnam pa
T03D3792:3a-20: kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa ste /
T03D3792:3a-21: chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yongs dag par //
T03D3792:3a-23: yongs su mi ston phyir mi ldog pa sa yi chos //
T03D3792:3a-24: mi 'chad de ni lung ma bstan pa yin rig bya //
T03D3792:3a-25: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3a-26: de'i rjes la rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par
T03D3792:3a-27: rtogs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyi
T03D3792:3a-28: lam gyis gsal ba rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro
T03D3792:3a-29: ba ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T03D3792:3a-30: dgra bcom dang rkyen gyi sangs rgyas ye shes dang //
T03D3792:3a-32: dgra bcom rang rgyal theg bral byang chub mchog nges na //
T03D3792:3a-33: dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya //
T03D3792:3a-34: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3a-35: de'i rjes la rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa thob
T03D3792:3a-36: pa dang ldan pas so so dang bsdus pa'i don
T03D3792:3a-37: khong du chud pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir rim
T03D3792:3a-38: pas bsgom pa ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs
T03D3792:3a-39: pa ste / sems can gang zag gzhan phyir sems pa rnam dag pa //
T03D3792:3a-40: zhes bya ba nas brtsams pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis so //
T03D3792:3a-41: de'i rjes la mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3792:3a-42: sgom pa dang ldan pas shin tu goms par bya
T03D3792:3a-43: ba'i phyir rtogs pa'i chos de dag nyid skad cig
T03D3792:3a-44: gcig la mngon du byas pa ni skad cig la
T03D3792:3a-45: mngon par byang chub pa ste /
T03D3792:3b-0: spyo ba byas sam 'on te @3b rtag tu brdeg kyang rung //
T03D3792:3b-1: zhes bya ba nas brtsams par tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis so //
T03D3792:3b-2: de'i rjes la skad cig ma gcig la mngon par
T03D3792:3b-3: rdzogs par byang chub pa bsgom pa dang ldan pas
T03D3792:3b-4: skad cig ma gnyis pa la bag chags dang bcas
T03D3792:3b-5: pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyin ci
T03D3792:3b-6: ma log pa rnam pa thams cad kyi de kho
T03D3792:3b-7: na nyid mngon sum du mdzad pa ni chos kyi
T03D3792:3b-8: sku'i mngon par byang chub pa ste /
T03D3792:3b-9: bdag gi bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis //
T03D3792:3b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis so //
T03D3792:3b-11: de'i rjes la thos pa la sogs pa'i shes rab
T03D3792:3b-12: bskyed pa'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa brgyad thob pa'i
T03D3792:3b-13: rgyu mtshan yum ji lta ba bzhin du mnyan pas
T03D3792:3b-14: rjes su btsal bas mngon par brjod pa ni /
T03D3792:3b-15: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig yun ring 'khor 'dod cing //
T03D3792:3b-17: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ji snyed bdag gis bzod snyam pa //
T03D3792:3b-18: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas //
T03D3792:3b-19: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3b-20: de'i rjes su tshol bar byed pa dang ldan pa
T03D3792:3b-21: la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3792:3b-23: tshul khrims kyis ni zhi ba 'dod rnams 'phags par 'gyur //
T03D3792:3b-25: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel gyur te //
T03D3792:3b-26: sprin med 'od gsal zla dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no //
T03D3792:3b-27: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3b-28: de'i rjes la gdams ngag bzung ba dang ldan pas
T03D3792:3b-29: khong du chud pa'i rim pa ci 'dra bar bya
T03D3792:3b-30: ba ni / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas yi dvags 'gro ba gcod //
T03D3792:3b-32: sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin //
T03D3792:3b-33: de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin //
T03D3792:3b-34: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis so //
T03D3792:3b-35: de'i rjes la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming don
T03D3792:3b-36: dang ldan pa rtogs pa mngon du 'gro bas yun
T03D3792:3b-37: ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir rjes su gtad
T03D3792:3b-38: pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T03D3792:3b-39: gcig gsungs te bsdus pa'i don yin no //
T03D3792:3b-40: de lta yin mod kyi rtogs sla ba nyid kyis
T03D3792:3b-41: don lhag ma bzhi po ma gsungs par shes rab
T03D3792:3b-42: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3792:3b-45: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03D3792:3b-46: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03D3792:4a-0: @4a * // rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang //
T03D3792:4a-1: rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
T03D3792:4a-2: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03D3792:4a-3: chos kyi sku dang de rnams brgyad //
T03D3792:4a-5: da ni tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad pas mdo'i don brjod par bya ste /
T03D3792:4a-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03D3792:4a-7: de nas kyi sgra ni rgyas par bstan pa'i de ma thag tu'am /
T03D3792:4a-8: man ngag mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i skabs yin no //
T03D3792:4a-9: yang gi sgra ni tshig gi rgyan no //
T03D3792:4a-10: nges pa'i tshig tu na nyon mongs pa la sogs
T03D3792:4a-11: pa bcom pas yang na bcom ldan 'das yin par
T03D3792:4a-12: bstan pa'am / dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pas so //
T03D3792:4a-13: nyan thos la sogs pas bstan pa'i gdul bya mi srid pas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan to //
T03D3792:4a-16: 'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T03D3792:4a-17: de dag gis sngar gzhung rgyas pa mnyan pas sbyangs
T03D3792:4a-18: pa'i phyir gang zhig bsdus nas nyan du rung ba
T03D3792:4a-19: de rnams kyi dbang du mdzad do //
T03D3792:4a-20: de dag ces bya ba'i tshig gis ni ma ning
T03D3792:4a-21: la sogs pa nyon mongs pa shas che ba'i phyir
T03D3792:4a-22: ram chos nyid rtogs pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan
T03D3792:4a-23: pas 'khor ma yin pa nyid phyir yul la nyes
T03D3792:4a-24: par spyod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T03D3792:4a-25: bral ba ma yin pa'i skyes pa dang bud med dag la srid pa'i phyir dge slong dan /
T03D3792:4a-28: dge bsnyen ma rnams bdag nyid la phan pa dang
T03D3792:4a-29: rtag pa'i 'khor rnams bsdus nas 'khor bzhi po nye
T03D3792:4a-30: bar bzung ste / de nas 'phags pa rab 'byor la sogs pa dge slong slob pa dang /
T03D3792:4a-32: de bzhin du skye dgu'i bdag mo la sogs pa dge slong ma rnams dang /
T03D3792:4a-33: gzugs can snying po la sogs pa'i slob pa'i dge bsnyen rnams dang /
T03D3792:4a-34: de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma sa ga la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams smos te /
T03D3792:4a-35: gleng gzhi'i le'ur bstan pa bzhin no //
T03D3792:4a-36: shin tu khyad par can gyi chos rtogs pa dang
T03D3792:4a-37: 'brel pas de dag gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i
T03D3792:4a-38: phyir dge slong la sogs pas kyang ma bsdus la
T03D3792:4a-39: / sems can gyi don byed pas gzhan gyi dbang
T03D3792:4a-40: du gyur pa'i phyir mi brtan pa'i 'khor yin pas
T03D3792:4a-41: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' ma smos so //
T03D3792:4a-42: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir zhes bya
T03D3792:4b-0: ba phyin ci @4b ma log pa'i brtson 'grus dang
T03D3792:4b-1: ldan pa'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa bsdus
T03D3792:4b-2: pa 'dod pas thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa
T03D3792:4b-3: skyed pa khong du chud pas yang dag par zhugs
T03D3792:4b-4: pa la rjes su mthun par bstan pa nyid kyis
T03D3792:4b-5: de lta bu'i yon tan la mngon par dga' ba
T03D3792:4b-6: dang spro ba spel ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:4b-7: de bzhin du 'dir don 'di nyid 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:4b-8: gzhan du na rigs pa dang mi ldan pas dor bar bya bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:4b-9: yang na yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir
T03D3792:4b-10: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid ngag la dbang bar
T03D3792:4b-11: bstan pas bdag nyid la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir
T03D3792:4b-12: bsdus nas bstan pas yang dag par dga' ba'i phyir
T03D3792:4b-13: ro // ci'i phyir ston ce na smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3792:4b-14: yang zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bstan pa la
T03D3792:4b-15: ltos nas yang 'di de ma thag tu bstan te
T03D3792:4b-16: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes gsungs pa la /
T03D3792:4b-17: thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa bskyed nas rnam
T03D3792:4b-18: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud pas
T03D3792:4b-19: gsal ba'i rab kyi mthar thug par phyin pa ste
T03D3792:4b-20: / pha rol ni de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi pha rol lo //
T03D3792:4b-21: shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3792:4b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtso bo ni /
T03D3792:4b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3792:4b-24: 'di zhes bya ba ni rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'o //
T03D3792:4b-25: dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid kyi lam ste /
T03D3792:4b-26: 'bras bu de'i don du sbyor ba nyid kyi gtso
T03D3792:4b-27: bo ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3792:4b-28: phyin pa'o // de dang 'di ste gsal bar byed
T03D3792:4b-29: pa'i kun rdzob la gzhan pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa
T03D3792:4b-30: gang gis 'jug pa gang yin pa rab tu phye
T03D3792:4b-32: de yang stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa de
T03D3792:4b-33: la sbyor bas na de gnyis ni brtag pa'i shes

T03D3792:8a-2: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T03D3792:8a-3: 'di nas byang du ri nag po //

T03D3792:8a-5: spros ngad ldan pa'i tshu rol na //
T03D3792:8a-6: chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho //

T03D3792:8a-11: byang nas ni si ta ste /

T03D3792:8a-23: pa chen po'i mdo las rnam par gzhag pa'i tshad

T03D3792:8a-35: me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa dag ni aa mra la sogs pa'i shing ngo //
T03D3792:8a-36: 'bras bu smin nas skam pa'i phyir sman ni shing la sogs pa'o //
T03D3792:8a-37: 'bras bu 'ba' zhig 'byung ba'i phyir nags ma ste /
T03D3792:8a-38: au dum b'a ra la sogs pa'o //

T03D3792:8b-1: bas tsha ba 'joms pas na ma dros pa ste

T03D3792:8b-7: ma dros pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3792:8b-8: dpe bstan nas don ni rgyal ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T03D3792:8b-10: dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3792:8b-11: ji snyed kyi chos mngon sum dang /

T03D3792:8b-15: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston par byed

T03D3792:8b-32: bar du'o // nyan thos kyi rang dbang gis kyang don ste ston pa yin no zhe na /

T03D3792:9a-4: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T03D3792:9b-36: byang chub sems dpa' de ni bde gshegs shes rab

T03D3792:14a-41: pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin yang ji lta
T03D3792:14a-42: ba bzhin spang ba'i phyir bsgom par bya ba de
T03D3792:14b-1: de lta bur yongs su shes pa la yon tan ci yod ce na /
T03D3792:14b-2: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:14b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bstan ma thag pa'i
T03D3792:14b-4: chos de lta bu shes pa de la sna tshogs
T03D3792:14b-5: pa'i 'du shes ni skyes bu rdzas dang btags par
T03D3792:14b-6: yod pa'i 'du shes mos pa yid la byed pa'i
T03D3792:14b-8: spangs pa de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3792:14b-9: dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pas
T03D3792:14b-11: gang zhig mos pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3792:14b-12: 'gro ba ma lus pa bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
T03D3792:14b-13: rim gyis thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gnas par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i par du'o //
T03D3792:14b-14: rnam par rtog pa bzhi po 'di rnams nye bar
T03D3792:14b-15: 'dus pa'i gdul bya'i skye bos khong du chud par
T03D3792:14b-16: bya ba'i phyir sngar rgyas par bcom ldan 'das kyi
T03D3792:14b-17: yul gyi dbye bas phye nas tha dad pa rnam
T03D3792:14b-19: de las 'dir ni gtsor bsdus nas bstan te /
T03D3792:14b-20: spros nas bstan pa cung zad kyang dgos pa med cing /
T03D3792:14b-21: yul gyi dbye bas shes pa gtso bo ma yin
T03D3792:14b-22: par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong phrag brgya
T03D3792:14b-23: pa dang / 'dir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
T03D3792:14b-24: mthun pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i yul gyis phye ba
T03D3792:14b-26: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mthong ba dang bsgom
T03D3792:14b-27: pa'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas rnam par rtog
T03D3792:14b-28: pa dbye ba bstan pa mdzad pa yang gzhan yin
T03D3792:14b-29: no // 'di ni snying po yin pas phan tshun
T03D3792:14b-30: spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de la phung po
T03D3792:14b-31: gzhan med pas ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs 'di rnam
T03D3792:14b-32: par rtog pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3792:14b-33: ltar de'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyi ma rnams la
T03D3792:14b-34: yang de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T03D3792:14b-35: da ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thabs mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi yongs su bzung ba ston te /
T03D3792:14b-36: de'i stobs kyis ji skad bstan pa khyad par du
T03D3792:14b-37: 'gyur bas dge ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3792:14b-38: gsungs te / bden pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin chos
T03D3792:14b-39: ston par byed pas gang zag bde 'gro'i 'bras bu
T03D3792:14b-40: thob par byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen no
T03D3792:15a-1: de dang ldan pa ni bcas pa'o //
T03D3792:15a-2: de nyid kyi thob pa la sogs pa'i shes pa
T03D3792:15a-3: skyes nas rigs pa dang lung gi chos yongs su
T03D3792:15a-4: brtags pa de nas bdag nyams zhes skrag par mi
T03D3792:15a-5: 'gyur zhing ci yang med pas snyems par mi 'gyur
T03D3792:15a-6: te / rgyal ba rnams kyi yum ni bcom ldan 'das te /
T03D3792:15a-7: skyed pas na yum ni bcom ldan 'das kyi shes
T03D3792:15a-8: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste mnyan nas
T03D3792:15a-9: rtogs par bya zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3792:15a-10: de ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa
T03D3792:15a-11: la sogs par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro
T03D3792:15a-13: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas bstan nas /
T03D3792:15a-14: ldog pa'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:15a-15: gang zhig sdig pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:15a-16: yang gang zhig ji skad bstan pa'i dge ba'i bshes
T03D3792:15a-17: gnyen pas bzlog pa ni sdig pa'i grogs ldan te
T03D3792:15a-18: / de nyid spangs pa med pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa ste /
T03D3792:15a-19: gzhan la rag las nas 'jug pa ni te /
T03D3792:15a-20: des na theg pa chen po las nyams shing zab
T03D3792:15a-21: mo'i chos la ma mos pas nyams par 'gyur te
T03D3792:15a-22: / bum pa so ma btang ba chus reg pas zhig pa bzhin no //
T03D3792:15a-23: des ji lta ba bzhin gyi yongs su bzung bar gyur pa bstan to //
T03D3792:15a-24: dro ba la sogs pa'i rjes la da ni ji
T03D3792:15a-25: skad bstan pa'i sgrub par nges par 'byed pa'i cha
T03D3792:15a-27: gzhan yang mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa khyad par
T03D3792:15a-28: du bsgrub pa'i gzhir gyur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T03D3792:15a-29: rang bzhin bstan par bzhed nas /
T03D3792:15a-30: ci phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:15a-31: gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyings nyid 'phags pa'i chos rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:15a-32: de'i bdag nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T03D3792:15a-33: rang bzhin du gnas pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3792:15a-34: chos kyi rigs chos nyid ces bya ba de nyid
T03D3792:15a-36: thams cad la khyab na ci phyir 'dir byang chub
T03D3792:15a-37: tu sems bskyed pa nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3792:15a-38: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du 'gro bar gnas
T03D3792:15a-40: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa thams cad la
T03D3792:15a-41: chags par byed pa ni mngon par zhen par byed
T03D3792:15a-42: pa ste 'jug par byed kyang thos pa la sogs
T03D3792:15b-0: pa'i stobs kyis phyin ci log tsam @15b 'khor ba
T03D3792:15b-1: de ltar rtogs pa ni chags pa gcod pa ste
T03D3792:15b-2: / mngon par zhen pa thams cad gcod pa'i dang
T03D3792:15b-3: tshul can du skyes par gyur pas de bzhin gshegs
T03D3792:15b-4: pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yin te /
T03D3792:15b-5: de bas na kun rdzob tu sgrib pa thams cad
T03D3792:15b-6: spong bar zhugs pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi
T03D3792:15b-7: rang bzhin kho na byang chub sems dpa' yin no
T03D3792:15b-8: // sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa nyid kyi byed pa zhes brjod do //
T03D3792:15b-9: de bas na 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no //
T03D3792:15b-10: gzhi ni rigs la bya ba ma yin nam /
T03D3792:15b-11: de bas na de sngon du 'gro ba can yin
T03D3792:15b-12: pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang por
T03D3792:15b-14: don de dag gi dang po sngon du 'gro ba bden mod kyi /
T03D3792:15b-15: 'di ni yang go bar bya ba la sngar 'bras bu shes par byas nas phyis rgyu bstan to //
T03D3792:15b-16: ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs pa gang yin zhe na /
T03D3792:15b-17: de'i rjes thogs la dmigs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:15b-18: rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:15b-19: gang gi phyir chos thams cad dmigs pa'i ngo bo
T03D3792:15b-20: ni bden pa gnyis las mi 'da' bar dmigs pas
T03D3792:15b-21: chags pa med par gyur te /
T03D3792:15b-22: de'i bden pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag par
T03D3792:15b-23: rtogs pa'i phyir bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa
T03D3792:15b-24: ma lus par spang ba'i ched du bya ba dang
T03D3792:15b-25: ldan par zhes bya bar 'brel te /
T03D3792:15b-26: chags pa med par 'gyur ba ni chags pa med pa'i rang bzhin te /
T03D3792:15b-27: byang chub ces bya bar 'dir yang 'brel ba yin te /
T03D3792:15b-28: phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa bla na med
T03D3792:15b-29: pa la reg pa ste thob par gyur pa yin
T03D3792:15b-30: no // de bas na byang chub ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa'o //
T03D3792:15b-31: de sems dpa' ni sems dpa' ste /
T03D3792:15b-32: des byed pas ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba don dang ldan pa'i ming nyid de /
T03D3792:15b-33: des na yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dang /
T03D3792:15b-35: bzang po zhes bya ba'i ming thob po //
T03D3792:15b-36: des ni dmigs par gyur pa bstan to //
T03D3792:15b-37: gang chos kyi dbyings nyid rtag tu rnam par dag
T03D3792:15b-38: pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa
T03D3792:15b-39: yin par 'dod na rtag tu rnam par gong nas
T03D3792:16a-1: par du 'gro ba ji skad brjod par bya ste /
T03D3792:16a-2: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //
T03D3792:16a-3: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
T03D3792:16a-4: ces bstan to zhes zer na /
T03D3792:16a-5: de lta yin na thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes
T03D3792:16a-6: pas nges pa'i dngos po'i rang gzhan du bsgom pa
T03D3792:16a-7: de bas na ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po'i de
T03D3792:16a-8: kho na nyid mngon sum du bya'o zhes der mngon
T03D3792:16a-9: par zhen pas 'jug pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i khyad par
T03D3792:16a-10: gyis kyang der mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags kyi
T03D3792:16a-11: sa bon mi spong gi / shin tu mnyam par
T03D3792:16a-12: gzhag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rim gyis rnam par rtog
T03D3792:16a-13: pa thams cad spong ngo zhes zer na /
T03D3792:16a-14: de lta yin na phyi'i don 'dod pa'i gzhung gis
T03D3792:16a-15: kyang nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3792:16a-17: 'on te khas mi len na de'i phyir rnam par
T03D3792:16a-18: rtog pa'i bag chags mi spong bas phyogs gcig dag
T03D3792:16a-20: khyod kyi lugs ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T03D3792:16a-21: skyon med de gang gi phyir dngos po'i ngo bo
T03D3792:16a-22: gang cung zad ji snyed pa kun brtags pa yin
T03D3792:16a-23: te / 'di dag thams cad la rigs pas dngos por ma grub pas dngos po med ces bya'o //
T03D3792:16a-24: bya ba byed pa'i gang dag don ji ltar snang
T03D3792:16a-25: ba de dag ni kun rdzob yin par bstan te
T03D3792:16a-26: / thos pa la sogs pa shes pa skyes pas
T03D3792:16a-27: de kho na nyid la sgrib pa'i rang bzhin can
T03D3792:16a-28: rim gyis thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med
T03D3792:16a-29: pa'i stobs kyis ji lta ba bzhin te /
T03D3792:16a-30: sgyu ma lta bur shes pa nyid yang dag par byas pa nyid yin no //
T03D3792:16a-31: rang bzhin gtso bor gyur pa ni rigs yin la /
T03D3792:16a-32: 'gyur ba gtso bor gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin te /
T03D3792:16a-33: gnyis po yang gnyis su ma grub pa la gzhi dang dmigs pa'i bye brag rtogs par bya'o //
T03D3792:16a-34: dmigs pa 'di la brjod par bya ba mang du yod mod kyi /
T03D3792:16a-35: ha cang thal ches pas gzhag go //
T03D3792:16a-36: 'bras bu cil btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs par byed ce na /
T03D3792:16a-37: de'i rjes la ched du bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:16a-38: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:16a-39: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud la byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya zhe na /
T03D3792:16a-40: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi sar sems dpa' chen
T03D3792:16b-0: po ste @16b tshad med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs
T03D3792:16b-1: dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi tshogs mang po
T03D3792:16b-2: la chos bstan pa mchog tu byed pa'i phyir mchog
T03D3792:16b-3: tu gyur pa'o // de bzhin du spong ba chen po nyid thob pa ste /
T03D3792:16b-4: lta bar gyur pa'i bdag nyid lta ba sna tshogs pa rnams ni chen po ste /
T03D3792:16b-5: sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sems can
T03D3792:16b-6: gyi tshogs kyis lta ba spangs pa'i thabs bstan pa
T03D3792:16b-7: ni gcod pa ste spong bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:16b-8: de nyid kyang rtogs pa chen po med na mi
T03D3792:16b-9: 'byung bas de dag gis de yang 'phangs pa de
T03D3792:16b-10: bas na 'bras bu rnam pa gsum thob pa la
T03D3792:16b-11: bsams nas sems can gyi don la bzhugs pa'i phyir
T03D3792:16b-12: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
T03D3792:16b-13: de ni ched du bya ba bstan to //
T03D3792:16b-14: dmigs pa dang ched du bya ba la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T03D3792:16b-15: mda' bkang ba dang 'ben la rgyab pa dang chos mthun pa ni bye brag yin no //
T03D3792:16b-16: de dag la nye bar gyur pa ni dmigs pa yin no //
T03D3792:16b-17: gzhan gyis bskal ba ni ched du bya ba ste /
T03D3792:16b-18: de gnyis kyi bye brag yin no //
T03D3792:16b-19: ched du bya ba'i rjes la da ni rdzogs pa'i ched du sgrub pa brjod par bya ste /
T03D3792:16b-20: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi yul
T03D3792:16b-21: dang ldan pa dkar po'i chos spyi'i rten can rnam
T03D3792:16b-22: pa kun mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon
T03D3792:16b-23: par rtogs pa bzhi po re re yang pha rol
T03D3792:16b-24: tu phyin pa drug gi rten can gyi bya ba
T03D3792:16b-26: chos kyi sku ni mngon par rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
T03D3792:16b-27: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de la bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:16b-28: de la go cha'i sgrub pa ni tshogs kyi yin par bzung ngo //
T03D3792:16b-29: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa yin par rtogs par bya'o //
T03D3792:16b-30: chogs kyi bsgrub pa ni rtse mo dang sbyin pa la sogs pa drug dang /
T03D3792:16b-38: gzungs kyi tshogs rnams ni chos kyi mchog chen pos bsdus pa yin no //
T03D3792:16b-39: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin tshogs
T03D3792:16b-40: kyi sgrub pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid
T03D3792:16b-41: can yin no // sa gnyis pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3792:16b-42: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin ni yang lam gyi
T03D3792:17a-0: can yin no // tshogs @17a * // kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T03D3792:17a-1: gnyen po'i bdag nyid can yang tshogs kyi bsgrub pa ni lam gnyis ka'i spyod yul can yin no //
T03D3792:17a-2: nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa ni yang bsgom pa'i lam yin te /
T03D3792:17a-3: rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i rten can yin te /
T03D3792:17a-4: de ltar sa gang du thog mar goms par byas pa'am /
T03D3792:17a-5: thob pa de la ltos pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T03D3792:17a-6: sgrub pa bzhi po de dag kyang khyad par gyi
T03D3792:17a-7: rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad sbyor ba ni mi
T03D3792:17a-9: 'dir khyad par ni ma yin te /
T03D3792:17a-10: bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir blo dman pa rjes su gzung ba yin no //
T03D3792:17a-11: gzhan du bslab par 'dod pas bye brag rnams sbyor na ma 'brel pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:17a-12: de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang blta bar bya'o //
T03D3792:17a-13: de la dang po brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin go
T03D3792:17a-14: cha'i bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen por
T03D3792:17a-15: gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan gtong ba che zhes bya ba
T03D3792:17a-17: de la thams cad stong pa'i bsam pa yod pa'i phyir gtong ba che ba'o //
T03D3792:17a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs
T03D3792:17a-19: pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas na blo che'o
T03D3792:17a-20: // gzhan gyis gnod pa la ji mi snyam pa
T03D3792:17a-21: la sogs pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pas na mthu
T03D3792:17a-22: // che ba'o // sems can gyi don gyi brtson
T03D3792:17a-23: 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pas na theg pa chen
T03D3792:17a-24: // che ba'o // po'o // sems rtse gcig pa thob pas na mchog go //
T03D3792:17a-25: las dang byed pa po dang bya ba gsum gyi
T03D3792:17a-26: dmigs pa ni shes rab dang ldan pas na de
T03D3792:17a-27: bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la zhugs
T03D3792:17a-29: de ltar go cha'i bsgrub pas khyad par du 'gro
T03D3792:17a-30: bas gnyis pa 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3792:17a-31: / go cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:17a-32: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang gzugs
T03D3792:17a-33: med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni chen po'o
T03D3792:17a-34: // lha'i bu'i bdud kyi sde ma rungs pa'i bsam pa nyid kyi rgyu can 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:17a-35: yid la re ba bzhin byed pas na dgos pa'o //
T03D3792:17a-36: de lta bu'i 'bad pa byed pas na sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do //
T03D3792:17a-37: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bsgrubs nas 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i
T03D3792:17a-38: byang chub chen po thob pa gsum pa tshogs kyi
T03D3792:17b-0: dper na zhes @17b bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:17b-1: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma'i gnas lam
T03D3792:17b-2: po che'i bzhi mdo ru sgyu ma mngon par sprul
T03D3792:17b-3: te / yang de'i skye bo phal po che'i tshogs
T03D3792:17b-4: kyi mgo rnam pa mang po bye ba gcod par
T03D3792:17b-5: byed pa ni rang gi sprul pa de rnams la
T03D3792:17b-6: dngos por mngon par zhen pa dang bral bas srog
T03D3792:17b-7: gcod pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pas de la skrag
T03D3792:17b-8: pa med do zhes bya bar 'brel to //
T03D3792:17b-9: de bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan gyi sprul pa bsad
T03D3792:17b-10: pa de dag ci 'dra bar de ltar gnyen po'i
T03D3792:17b-11: sgyu ma byed pa'i byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu'i
T03D3792:17b-12: bdud la sogs pa'i sprul pa 'joms pa na /
T03D3792:17b-13: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' des 'gro ba
T03D3792:17b-14: kun las dang nyon mongs pas sprul pa yin par
T03D3792:17b-15: thos pa la sogs pa'i shes pa skyes pa rab
T03D3792:17b-16: tu shes pa de bas na /
T03D3792:17b-17: de la kha na ma tho ba 'jigs pa med cing skrag pa med par gyur pa yin no //
T03D3792:17b-18: 'gro ba kun sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin na
T03D3792:17b-19: ji ltar bcings pa dang grol bar 'gyur zhes zer
T03D3792:17b-20: na / de kho na nyid du cung zad kyang med par bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:17b-21: gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:17b-22: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma rig pas bcings pa med cing /
T03D3792:17b-23: rig pa'i mthus grol ba yang yod min te zhes rjes su sbyar ro //
T03D3792:17b-24: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin te med pa ma yin no //
T03D3792:17b-26: yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:17b-27: ji lta bu kun rdzob yin zhe na /
T03D3792:17b-28: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:17b-29: 'di ltar rigs pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid
T03D3792:17b-30: yin yang 'di ltar snang ba ni dgag par mi
T03D3792:17b-31: nus te / thams cad tha snyad yin par rtogs nas sems zhum pa med do //
T03D3792:17b-32: 'on kyang bcings pa dang grol ba dor bar bya ba dang /
T03D3792:17b-33: blang bar bya ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin chos nyid la rtogs nas zhugs te /
T03D3792:17b-34: de nyid bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ji lta ba bzhin gyi chos rtogs nas byang chub 'thob te /
T03D3792:17b-35: rigs pa'i stobs kyis thar pa rnam par bzhag la /
T03D3792:17b-36: gzhan gyis ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa las bzlog
T03D3792:17b-37: pa ma rig pa'i nus pas bcings pa yin pa'i
T03D3792:17b-38: phyir de bas na de dag gi rjes la go
T03D3792:18a-0: cha bstan to // brtse ba la sogs pa @18a * //
T03D3792:18a-1: sgrub par byed pa ni gang zag dam pa rnams te /
T03D3792:18a-2: nyan thos la sogs pa la ltos nas rgyal ba'i sras te /
T03D3792:18a-3: bden pa gnyis la brten pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i lam yin no //
T03D3792:18a-4: ji skad bstan pa nyid theg pa chen po yin
T03D3792:18a-5: par ci'i phyir zhes dri ba sngon du 'gro bas
T03D3792:18a-6: theg pa chen po'i ngo bo rdzogs par bya ba'i
T03D3792:18a-7: phyir / ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:18a-8: gang du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lam brtse ba dang /
T03D3792:18a-9: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis sgrub pa la
T03D3792:18a-10: zhon pa ni thob pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa
T03D3792:18a-11: ste / rim gyis sems can thams cad mya ngan las zlo bar byed do //
T03D3792:18a-12: de bas na 'di ni theg pa chen po yin no //
T03D3792:18a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T03D3792:18a-15: gang gi phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dpag tu
T03D3792:18a-16: med pa'i sems can gyi go skabs 'byed par bsnyen
T03D3792:18a-17: pas na 'di ni theg pa chen po'o //
T03D3792:18a-18: yon tan rnam pa thams cad mthar thug pa nas
T03D3792:18a-19: gzhal med khang dang 'dra bas na gzhal med khang
T03D3792:18a-20: chen no // dga' skyid bde ba zhes bya ba
T03D3792:18a-21: la sogs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir zag pa
T03D3792:18a-23: lus kyi bde ba'i tshogs ni skyid pa'o //
T03D3792:18a-24: bde ba ni sems las byung ba bde ba'o //
T03D3792:18a-25: mngon par 'thob byed ni dga' skyid bde ba la
T03D3792:18a-26: mngon par phyogs te thob pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T03D3792:18a-28: yang na khyad par du 'phags pa de bas na
T03D3792:18a-29: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa
T03D3792:18a-30: la theg pa chen po zhes brjod do //
T03D3792:18a-31: de lta mod kyi phyogs gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro
T03D3792:18a-32: ba'i gnas skabs thob pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i
T03D3792:18a-33: rgyu la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'jig
T03D3792:18a-34: rten pa la grags pa ma yin nam /
T03D3792:18a-35: de bzhin du theg pa chen po yin par 'dzin
T03D3792:18a-36: pas phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro zhes zer na
T03D3792:18a-37: / gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:18a-38: theg pa chen po la zhon pa ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3792:18a-39: phyogs ni shar phyogs la sogs pa des nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T03D3792:18a-40: sa dang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su phyin
T03D3792:18a-41: pa des de kho na nyid dmigs pa med do
T03D3792:18a-42: // de lta yin na ji ltar mya ngan las
T03D3792:18a-43: 'das par 'gro zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'jug ce
T03D3792:18b-0: // na / mya @18b ngan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:18b-1: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro zhes bya ba 'dir
T03D3792:18b-2: yang phyin ci log gi ngo bo bzlog pa nyid
T03D3792:18b-3: la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i rigs
T03D3792:18b-4: pas 'gro ba ni mi dmigs pa'o //
T03D3792:18b-5: 'jig rten pas kyang rang gi ngo bo dgag pa
T03D3792:18b-6: tsam nyid la mya ngan las 'das zhes bya bar
T03D3792:18b-8: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:18b-9: dper na me shi ba la 'gags zhes bya bar
T03D3792:18b-10: tha snyad 'dogs kyi me de 'gags pas 'das par
T03D3792:18b-11: bya ba byed pa ma yin no //
T03D3792:18b-12: ngo bo thob pa med pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa ma yin no //
T03D3792:18b-13: gnas pas da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
T03D3792:18b-14: dus kyis 'gyur pa'i bye brag khyad par 'gyur ba mi srid de tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:18b-15: rgyu des na rang gi ngo bo log pa tsam
T03D3792:18b-16: la 'jig rten pas kyang me shi zhes brjod par
T03D3792:18b-17: byed do // gal te de lta na theg pa
T03D3792:18b-18: chen po de kho na nyid kyi khyad par rtogs
T03D3792:18b-19: pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3792:18b-20: de la zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan
T03D3792:18b-21: las 'das pa la zlo zhe na /
T03D3792:18b-22: byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:18b-23: sngon gyi mtha' ni rgyu'i stobs kyi phyi ma'i mthar
T03D3792:18b-24: 'bras bu bskyed pa'i phyir da ltar byung ba la
T03D3792:18b-25: de dag gi rang gi ngo bo nges par byang
T03D3792:18b-26: chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa ste /
T03D3792:18b-27: yang dag pa'i don yin par sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:18b-28: de bas na dus gsum gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir dag par gyur pa yin te /
T03D3792:18b-29: de lta bu'i rigs pas gang dag pa ni 'jig
T03D3792:18b-30: rten pa'i mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin pas
T03D3792:18b-31: de nyid kyi phyir chags pa la sogs pa'i spros
T03D3792:18b-32: pa spangs pa'i phyir spros pa med pa'o //
T03D3792:18b-33: kun tu sems can mya ngan las zlo bar nus te /
T03D3792:18b-34: gzhan du na de dag gis de kho na nyid
T03D3792:18b-35: kyi khyad par ma rtogs par mngon par zhen pa
T03D3792:18b-36: des phyin ci log ma spangs pas sems can gyi
T03D3792:18b-38: de lta bu de las bzlog pa de nyid ni
T03D3792:18b-39: shes rab dang snying rje la sogs pa tshogs kyi
T03D3792:18b-41: theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa'i rang bzhin
T03D3792:18b-42: pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa gang yin pa yang
T03D3792:18b-44: tshogs bsags pa la bzhi pa nges par 'byung bas
T03D3792:19a-0: de bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems zhes @19a *
T03D3792:19a-1: // bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:19a-2: gzegs zan la sogs pas dus rtag par brtags pa
T03D3792:19a-3: bkag nas dngos po la nye bar 'jug pa nyid
T03D3792:19a-4: kyi brdar byas pa'i phyir tshe ste /
T03D3792:19a-5: brda' gang gi dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bden pa gnyis rtogs pas na mkhas pa'o //
T03D3792:19a-6: ched du bya ba'i nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub par
T03D3792:19a-7: spyod par byed cing chos rnams ma skyes par rtogs
T03D3792:19a-8: nas 'gro ba sems can thams cad yul du byed
T03D3792:19a-9: pa ni snying rje chen po skyed pa'o //
T03D3792:19a-10: bdag dang gzhan du mngon par zhen pa med pa
T03D3792:19a-11: ni sems can 'du shes med de yod pa'i 'du
T03D3792:19a-13: de'i tshe shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa de ni shes rab bo //
T03D3792:19a-14: don thams cad kyi ched du bya ba'i nges par
T03D3792:19a-15: 'byung ba'i sgrub pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3792:19a-16: mchog go // gang spyod pa byed ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3792:19a-17: sems can du dmigs na nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
T03D3792:19a-18: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:19a-19: gal te rang dang gzhan dag yod par 'du shes skyed par byed na /
T03D3792:19a-20: de'i sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes skyes pas sbyin pa
T03D3792:19a-21: la sogs pa rnams la dka' bas spyod par byed
T03D3792:19a-22: cing sdug bsngal spyod pas 'gro ba'i don bya'o zhes
T03D3792:19a-23: dmigs pa'i phyir bdag dang gzhan du yongs su rtogs
T03D3792:19a-24: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin no //
T03D3792:19a-25: de bas na bdag dang gzhan gyi char yongs su
T03D3792:19a-26: 'dzin pa'i nyes pa de gnyis kyis nyes pa thams
T03D3792:19a-27: cad 'byung ngo // de lta bas na yang /
T03D3792:19a-28: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin //
T03D3792:19a-29: zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
T03D3792:19a-30: ji ltar spyad par bya zhe na /
T03D3792:19a-31: bdag ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:19a-32: skye ba med pa dang skye ba zhes rim pa gzhan du sbyar ro //
T03D3792:19a-33: bden pa gnyis tha dad par gnyis kyi rang bzhin
T03D3792:19a-34: du mi rtog cing yid la mi byed pa ni
T03D3792:19a-35: gang gi tshe thams cad kyi thams cad du bdag
T03D3792:19a-36: gi rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal
T03D3792:19a-37: bar bya'o zhes bdag nyid ci 'dra bar sems can
T03D3792:19a-38: thams cad de 'dra bar shes pa ni lha la
T03D3792:19a-39: sogs pa'i sems can la zhes so //
T03D3792:19a-41: kun rdzob tu gcig tu rtogs pa ci 'dra bar
T03D3792:19a-42: sems can thams cad sgro btags pas dben par shes
T03D3792:19b-0: pa de @19b 'drar sems bskyed pa la sogs pa
T03D3792:19b-2: stong pa nyid kyi rigs pas gcig nyid du rtogs
T03D3792:19b-3: pas bden pa gnyis la yang dag par zhugs pa
T03D3792:19b-4: de'i tshe / 'di ni shes rab pha rol tu phyin mchog spyod ma yin no //
T03D3792:19b-5: de ltar rtogs par bya ba'i dngos po brtags par bstan nas /
T03D3792:19b-6: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:19b-7: 'jig rten dag na chos ming yongs su brjod pa
T03D3792:19b-8: ni sems bskyed pa la sogs pas rab tu bsgrags
T03D3792:19b-9: pa'i ming gi sgra'i shes pa ni rjod par byed
T03D3792:19b-11: de dag kun la skye ba dang ni yang dag 'das spangs te /
T03D3792:19b-13: de nyid spangs pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T03D3792:19b-14: nyams pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'chi med do //
T03D3792:19b-15: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang
T03D3792:19b-16: bzhin phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dam
T03D3792:19b-17: pa ste / khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos kyi ngo bo'o //
T03D3792:19b-18: de las gzhan gong na med pa'i ye shes kyi don thob pa ni dgos pa yin no //
T03D3792:19b-19: ched du bya ba nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i
T03D3792:19b-20: shes rab ni mchog ste pha rol tu phyin pa'o
T03D3792:19b-21: // de ltar grub pa la rnam par bkag nas
T03D3792:19b-22: zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rab tu grags pa'i ming
T03D3792:19b-24: grub pa de la ji ltar 'jug par bya zhe na /
T03D3792:19b-25: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:19b-26: rim pa bzhin du sbyar te /
T03D3792:19b-27: rang bzhin de ni de bzhin nyid do //
T03D3792:19b-28: med pa ni sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3792:19b-29: chos rnams bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis yongs
T03D3792:19b-30: su shes par gyur pa de lta bur gyur pa'i
T03D3792:19b-31: ched du bya ba'i bsgrub pa'i spyod pa'o //
T03D3792:19b-32: dogs med ni the tshom med par bya'o /
T03D3792:19b-33: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des thabs dang shes
T03D3792:19b-34: rab dang ldan te kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T03D3792:19b-35: la gnas pa'o // shes rab byas pa nges par byas pa'o //
T03D3792:19b-36: yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir 'di ni shes rab ste /
T03D3792:19b-37: ji skad bstan pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i bsgrub pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog yin te /
T03D3792:19b-38: de la spyod pa ni zhugs pa'o //
T03D3792:19b-39: de dag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bstan te /
T03D3792:19b-41: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03D3792:20a-0: @20a * // nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03D3792:20a-1: sgrub pa yi yang bzhir gyur pa //
T03D3792:20a-2: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03D3792:20a-3: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni //
T03D3792:20a-4: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03D3792:20a-5: tshogs ni nges par 'byung byas rnams //
T03D3792:20a-6: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid ces gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3792:20a-7: gzhung 'dir tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis nye bar
T03D3792:20a-8: bsdus pa ni gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir yin te
T03D3792:20a-9: / stong phrag brgya pa'i don thams cad bsdus pa'i
T03D3792:20a-10: phyir de dang mthun par le'u sbyar bar rigs mod
T03D3792:20a-11: kyis blo dman pa rnams kyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir
T03D3792:20a-12: / ma byas te / de bzhin du stong phrag
T03D3792:20a-13: nyi shu lnga po dang yang mthun par ma byas
T03D3792:20a-14: / ma byas te / so // skye bo thams
T03D3792:20a-15: cad kyis bde bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ram
T03D3792:20a-16: / ma byas te / so // / don gcig
T03D3792:20a-17: par shes par shes par bya ba'i phyir brgyad stong
T03D3792:20a-18: pa dang mthun par le'u tha ma'i dbye ba 'dir
T03D3792:20a-19: le'u rdzogs par bdag gis byas so //
T03D3792:20a-20: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:20a-21: pa las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
T03D3792:20a-22: 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'i bshad pa'o /
T03D3792:20a-24: // / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs pa
T03D3792:20a-25: ni lam yongs su ma shes par ma yin pas
T03D3792:20a-27: de la dang po rten la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:20a-28: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:20a-29: gzugs la sogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa gang zhig
T03D3792:20a-30: mi sbyor bar gnas pa ni chos nyid la gnas
T03D3792:20a-31: par 'gyur ro // 'di ltar 'od kyis mog mog
T03D3792:20a-32: por mdzad pas rgyud la yod pa'i nga rgyal bcom
T03D3792:20a-34: des yang dag par byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni yul so sor nges pa yin no //
T03D3792:20a-35: 'di na snod min sems can 'ga' yang med //
T03D3792:20a-36: ces gsungs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur te /
T03D3792:20a-37: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang cig shos kyi rnal
T03D3792:20a-38: 'byor pas kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob pas na lam
T03D3792:20a-39: shes pa bsgom pa ni khyab pa yin no //
T03D3792:20a-40: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs
T03D3792:20a-41: par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad mi
T03D3792:20a-42: spong ba ni rang bzhin no //
T03D3792:20a-43: shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis yongs
T03D3792:20a-44: su ma bzung ba'i sems can yongs su bzung ba
T03D3792:20b-0: @20b la sogs pa gang yang rung ba las su
T03D3792:20b-2: dbye ba lnga po'i don med na mi 'byung ba'i
T03D3792:20b-3: phyir chos nyid kyi sgras 'phangs pa yin no zhes
T03D3792:20b-4: rtogs par bya'o // gzhan du na lam shes pas
T03D3792:20b-5: rtogs par mi rigs pas de nyid kyi phyir de
T03D3792:20b-6: rtogs pa'i thabs yin pas de dag don gyi dbye
T03D3792:20b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lam
T03D3792:20b-9: shes pa'i rang bzhin mchog la spyod pa yin no
T03D3792:20b-10: // rten la sogs pa bstan pa'i shugs kyis lam shes pa'i dbang du byas te /
T03D3792:20b-11: rang gi lam thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu
T03D3792:20b-12: phyin pa'i rab tu rtogs pa thob nas theg pa
T03D3792:20b-13: gzhan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can tha dad pa'i sems
T03D3792:20b-14: can gyi don mngon sum du mi byed par lam
T03D3792:20b-15: rgyu dang bcas pa bstan pa la yongs su mkhas
T03D3792:20b-16: pa'i thabs la mkhas pas lam thams cad byang chub
T03D3792:20b-17: sems dpas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i
T03D3792:20b-18: phyir nyan thos kyis lam bstan pa'i ched du rtag
T03D3792:20b-19: dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:20b-20: de la chos nyid kyis skyes pa 'jig pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o //
T03D3792:20b-21: zag pa dang bcas pas mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
T03D3792:20b-22: bdag dang gzhan gyis stong pa'i phyir stong pa'o //
T03D3792:20b-23: rtag pa nyid la sogs pa de nyid las bzlog
T03D3792:20b-24: par bya ba de gnyis ni dor bar bya ba
T03D3792:20b-25: dang blang bar bya ba yin no //
T03D3792:20b-26: gtso bo'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa bzung ba yin no //
T03D3792:20b-27: de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong zhes bya ba
T03D3792:20b-28: 'dis ni rab tu 'byed pa'i stobs kyis lhag ma
T03D3792:20b-29: bden pa gsum po'i phyin ci log dang phyin ci
T03D3792:20b-30: ma log pa de gnyis mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen
T03D3792:20b-31: po'i rnam pa bsdus pa yin no //
T03D3792:20b-32: de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar goms par bya zhe na /
T03D3792:20b-33: stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:20b-34: gzugs la sogs pa de dag des mi dmigs so //
T03D3792:20b-35: 'dir rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi gnyen po
T03D3792:20b-36: mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i bden pa
T03D3792:20b-37: bzhi'i dngos po la dmigs pa nyan thos kyi mthong
T03D3792:20b-38: ba'i lam bskyed pas des mthong bas spang bar bya
T03D3792:20b-39: ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa dus ji
T03D3792:20b-40: srid sgom pa gang zhig shes pas phyis lam der
T03D3792:20b-41: ltung bar dogs nas spang ba'i phyir rnam pa de
T03D3792:20b-42: dag mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed do
T03D3792:21a-1: nyid kyi bden pas spyir 'bras bu cung zad gang thob pa la yang mi gnas so //
T03D3792:21a-2: de nyid kyi phyir dbang po rtul po dang 'bring
T03D3792:21a-3: dang rnon po la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3792:21a-4: rnam pa bsgom pa na rim pa ji lta ba
T03D3792:21a-5: bzhin byang chub rnam pa gsum thob ces nyan thos
T03D3792:21a-6: kyi theg pa las bstan pa'o //

T03D3792:40b-19: ba med de / 'di dag gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:40b-20: de ltar shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba 'di
T03D3792:40b-21: ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan
T03D3792:40b-22: pas des phyin ci log bzlog gi /
T03D3792:40b-24: dmus long la sogs pa ltar spyan ma tshang ba dang /
T03D3792:40b-25: blta na snyam pa'i yid la byed pas ma mthong
T03D3792:40b-26: ba ni yang dag par mthong ba zhes mi bya
T03D3792:40b-27: ste / de ni 'di ltar 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas /
T03D3792:40b-28: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la mngon par
T03D3792:40b-29: zhen pa'i rtsa ba rnal 'byor pa de'i nyon mongs
T03D3792:40b-30: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T03D3792:40b-32: 'dir ci 'dra ba mthong ba yin zhe na /
T03D3792:40b-33: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:40b-34: ji ltar nam mkha' la rdzas thams cad kyi dben pa'i phyir mngon sum dang /
T03D3792:40b-35: rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma las 'das pas mthong
T03D3792:40b-36: ba med kyang sems can kun rdzob kyi tha snyad
T03D3792:40b-37: du yin gyi / yang dag pa de kho na
T03D3792:40b-38: nyid du ni nam mkha' med pa'i phyir gcig tu
T03D3792:40b-39: gzugs ji ltar mthong ste mthong ba nyid med do
T03D3792:40b-40: du yin gyi / // de bas na don 'di brtags bar gyis te rnam par dpyad pas so //
T03D3792:40b-41: de bas na nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni tha snyad do //
T03D3792:40b-42: mthong ba med pa nyid mthong ba yin no zhes
T03D3792:40b-43: bya ba lhag ma ma yin par rtogs par bya'o
T03D3792:40b-44: // de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to //
T03D3792:40b-45: gang gi phyir mthong ba med pa ni gcig tu nges pa'i rang bzhin mthong bar mi nus te /
T03D3792:40b-46: dngos po thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:40b-47: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:40b-48: pa las 'jigs rten bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
T03D3792:41a-0: / @41a * // shes pa'i rnam pa spyi'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pas khyad par du shes par bya dgos pas /
T03D3792:41a-1: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T03D3792:41a-2: de yang nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam rnams kyi
T03D3792:41a-3: khyad par gyi lam gyi bdag nyid bsam gyis mi
T03D3792:41a-4: khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par
T03D3792:41a-5: du 'phags pa sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i
T03D3792:41a-6: yul la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa
T03D3792:41a-7: la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3792:41a-8: / mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:41a-9: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T03D3792:41a-10: mi mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa nyid kyi rnam
T03D3792:41a-11: pa rnams yid la byed pas yum mthong ba yin
T03D3792:41a-12: pas de mthong ba thob pa yang 'dir sbyor ba'i
T03D3792:41a-13: stobs kyis chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi mtshan
T03D3792:41a-14: nyid kyi rang bzhin du sdug bsngal la chos shes
T03D3792:41a-15: pa'i bzod pa la sogs pa dang 'dir rab tu
T03D3792:41a-16: 'brel pa'i bya ba thams cad des yin te /
T03D3792:41a-17: rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar //
T03D3792:41a-18: de bzhin du ji snyed pa dang /
T03D3792:41a-19: sangs rgyas kyi sgra gang yin pa kun la sbyar te /
T03D3792:41a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T03D3792:41a-21: rang sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i chos rnams dang /
T03D3792:41a-22: de bzhin du nyan thos rnams kyi bya ba ji
T03D3792:41a-23: snyed pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3792:41a-25: de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:41a-26: rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:41a-27: rgyal po'i grong ni lus 'phags la sogs pa'o //
T03D3792:41a-28: yul ni ma ga dh'a la sogs pa'o //
T03D3792:41a-29: 'khor ni rgyal po'i khab la sogs pa ste /
T03D3792:41a-30: der mi 'gro bar rgyal po de'i rang bzhin yul mis 'bru thams cad kyang sdud pa ste /
T03D3792:41a-31: bskyel ba ltar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du yang mi 'gro la ste /
T03D3792:41a-32: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la sogs
T03D3792:41a-33: pa khyad par gyi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi sangs
T03D3792:41a-34: rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan thams cad sdud do //
T03D3792:41a-35: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:41a-36: pa las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bcu
T03D3792:41a-39: // / yang gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi yon tan khyad par can rnams thob ce na /
T03D3792:41b-0: gang la zhes bya ba la @41b sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:41b-1: gang gis sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:41b-2: bde gshegs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te /
T03D3792:41b-3: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi zil gyis mi non pa'i
T03D3792:41b-4: byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa brtan po yod
T03D3792:41b-5: na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba ste /
T03D3792:41b-6: mchog ni chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:41b-7: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su gnas pa yod na /
T03D3792:41b-8: de'i tshe bden pa gnyis kyi rim pas zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:41b-9: nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin tu 'das byas
T03D3792:41b-10: nas bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pas zil gyis
T03D3792:41b-11: mi gnon pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub kyi
T03D3792:41b-12: rgyu khyad par gyi mtshan nyid myur du 'thob bo
T03D3792:41b-13: // dad pa dang shes rab yul la drag tu
T03D3792:41b-14: sgrub pa ni bya ba yin no zhes bstan par
T03D3792:41b-15: // 'gyur ro // chos thams cad kyi sngon du dad pa 'gro ba ma yin nam /
T03D3792:41b-16: ji ltar shes rab kyi bya ba yin zhe na /
T03D3792:41b-17: lan du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i dpe sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:41b-18: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:41b-19: dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru ni chag gyur pa //
T03D3792:41b-20: mi gang ro'am rtsva'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa //
T03D3792:41b-21: chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngogs su phyin mi 'gyur //
T03D3792:41b-22: yang gang zhig ro la sogs pa la 'dzin pa
T03D3792:41b-23: de ni bde bar pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur
T03D3792:41b-24: te / de thang la gnas par de ltar dad
T03D3792:41b-25: ldan dang ba tsam thob pa gang zhig gis ni
T03D3792:41b-26: shes rab pha rol tu phyin yum rjes su mi
T03D3792:41b-27: te / 'jug ste / dmigs pa la sogs pa
T03D3792:41b-28: ma spangs pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
T03D3792:41b-29: brgal dka' ba'i phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ste /
T03D3792:41b-30: 'khor ba des dus thams cad du gnas te /
T03D3792:41b-31: dad pa tsam gyis phyin ci log mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:41b-34: rang gi rigs mthun pa'i rgyun chad pas na 'chi ba'o //
T03D3792:41b-35: bu dang bu mo la sogs pa dang bral bas yid mi bde ba ni mya ngan no //
T03D3792:41b-36: de dag nyid rlabs te gang gi phyir de dag gi rim pa ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'o //
T03D3792:41b-37: de la de skad ces brjod de /
T03D3792:41b-38: de bas na sbyor zhes bya ba'o //
T03D3792:42a-0: gang zhig de yang dad pa stobs su gyur @42a * //
T03D3792:42a-1: pas shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gis zin pa ste /
T03D3792:42a-2: dngos po rnams sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin la mkhas pa'o //
T03D3792:42a-3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyi stobs
T03D3792:42a-4: kyis mya ngan las 'das pa yang mthong ba'i phyir
T03D3792:42a-6: de bas na dad pa dang shes rab kyi stobs
T03D3792:42a-7: la sogs pas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T03D3792:42a-8: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi nor kun rdzob tu
T03D3792:42a-9: yongs su rdzogs pa ni gru ste /
T03D3792:42a-10: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa rang bzhin
T03D3792:42a-11: de dag dang ldan pa la de skad brjod do
T03D3792:42a-12: // nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul ma yin pas
T03D3792:42a-13: mchog tu rmad byung bde gshegs byang chub myur du
T03D3792:42a-14: reg / khyad par gyi mtshan nyid don du gnyer
T03D3792:42a-15: bas gnyis po rgyun mi 'chad par dmigs par bya'o
T03D3792:42a-16: zhes bstan par rig par bya'o //
T03D3792:42a-17: dmigs pa dang dmigs pa med pa'i dpes rim pa
T03D3792:42a-18: ji lta ba bzhin du res 'ga' byed pa dang
T03D3792:42a-19: / rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa mi mthun pa'i
T03D3792:42a-20: phyogs dang gnyen po bsal bar bya ba'i phyir de
T03D3792:42a-21: gnyis nyid thob pa ni khyad par can gyi gzhir
T03D3792:42a-22: gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba yin par bstan pa'i
T03D3792:42a-23: / phyir / dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:42a-24: dper na la las rdza so ma btang chu bskyed na //
T03D3792:42a-25: nyam chung phyir na myur du 'jig par rig par bya ste /
T03D3792:42a-26: chu bcu bar mi nus pa'o //
T03D3792:42a-27: so btang bum par chu bskyed lam du 'jig pa yi //
T03D3792:42a-28: 'jigs pa med cing phyi ma la yang sbyar ro //
T03D3792:42a-29: phyin par gyur pa ni bar chad kyi gnod pa med par gyur pas khyim du bde bar ro //
T03D3792:42a-30: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang /
T03D3792:42a-31: shes rab rnam par nyams nas gnyis su ltung bas myur du ma rung 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:42a-32: dad pa de nyid kyis shes rab kyi don ni
T03D3792:42a-33: chos rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su zin
T03D3792:42a-34: gyur na nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa gnyis las
T03D3792:42a-35: shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur /
T03D3792:42a-36: bum pa so ma btang ba dang btang bas mi thob pa dang /
T03D3792:42a-37: thob pa'i chos kyi rten ma yin pa dang rten du gyur pa bstan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:42a-38: rten gzhan yang dad pa la sogs pa ma yin nam /
T03D3792:42a-39: ci'i phyir de gnyis kho na gtsor bstan ce na /
T03D3792:42b-0: lan @42b 'di dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:42b-1: dper na shing rnying pa dbyung ba la sogs pa'i
T03D3792:42b-2: bcos legs ma byas pa'i gru rgya mtsho chen por
T03D3792:42b-3: nor dang bcas par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:42b-4: yang gru legs par bcos legs par byas pa dang /
T03D3792:42b-5: mthun pa'i rlung dang ldan par byas na mi 'jig
T03D3792:42b-6: nor dang bcas pa dogs su phyin par 'gyur ro
T03D3792:42b-7: // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bzung yang //
T03D3792:42b-8: shes rab med na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba las nyams par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:42b-9: byang chub sems dpa' dad pa de nyid yongs bsgoms
T03D3792:42b-10: pas shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan pa
T03D3792:42b-11: ni bzang po dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3792:42b-12: de nyams shing gzhan du ltung bar mi 'gyur te /
T03D3792:42b-13: ma rmas ma nyams par de yang rang gi theg
T03D3792:42b-14: pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir de bzhin
T03D3792:42b-15: nyid rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub mchog la reg
T03D3792:42b-16: par 'gyur te / gnyis po kho nas grub pas
T03D3792:42b-17: ma tshang ba med pa yin pa shes par bya'o
T03D3792:42b-18: par 'gyur te / // zag lhan byas pa dang
T03D3792:42b-19: ma byas pa'i grus 'grub pa dang mi 'grub pa
T03D3792:42b-20: par 'gyur te / // dang / tshang ba dang ma tshang ba shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:42b-21: de gnyis kho na yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:42b-22: lo brgya zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te /
T03D3792:42b-23: dper na skyes bu gang zhig rgas shing gnyer ma
T03D3792:42b-24: dang ldan pas 'khogs pa zas la sogs pa dang
T03D3792:42b-25: mi ldan pas sdug bsngal ba lo brgya dang nyi
T03D3792:42b-26: shu lon pas gang gi yang ji srid na stan
T03D3792:42b-27: las langs kyang / de bzhin du yang rang gis rgyang grags phyed dam /
T03D3792:42b-28: rgyang grags su grogs med par nus pa med pa'i phyir 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te /
T03D3792:42b-29: de ni g-yas g-yon gnyis kyi lag pa gnyis mi
T03D3792:42b-30: dag gis brten byas par gyur na de'i tshe 'gyel
T03D3792:42b-31: ba'i 'jigs pa med cing ji srid du 'gro bar
T03D3792:42b-32: bya ba'i gnas su bde blag tu phyin par 'gyur
T03D3792:42b-33: / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab la
T03D3792:42b-34: 'di ltar rmongs pas stobs chung ba gang gi tshe
T03D3792:42b-35: yang dad pa tsam gyis zhugs par gyur kyang /
T03D3792:42b-36: 'di ltar yang chos nyid kyis ma bzung zhing bral
T03D3792:42b-37: na nyan thos la sogs pa'i sar ltung ba'i bar
T03D3792:42b-38: thob pas nyams par 'gyur te 'jig par 'gyur ro
T03D3792:42b-39: // de nyid thabs dang shes rab mchog gis yong zin na //
T03D3792:43a-2: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid rtogs nas mi'i drang srong
T03D3792:43a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub la reg par 'gyur
T03D3792:43a-4: ro // des na skyes bu rgas pa brten pa
T03D3792:43a-5: dang ma brten pa'i dpes shes rab dang thabs la
T03D3792:43a-6: mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
T03D3792:43a-7: ma bzung ba dag ci rigs par 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par ltung ba dang /
T03D3792:43a-8: mi ltung ba dag bsal bar byas pas bstan pa'i don rtogs par bya'o //
T03D3792:43a-9: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:43a-10: pa las dpe'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o
T03D3792:43a-12: / // / ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas khyad par gyi
T03D3792:43a-13: lam thob nas dmigs pa'i ro myang ba med par
T03D3792:43a-14: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs kyis bya ba ma
T03D3792:43a-15: yin pa mi byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:43a-16: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:43a-17: byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las can ni khyad
T03D3792:43a-18: par gyi mtshan nyid la zhugs pa'i phyir dang po'i
T03D3792:43a-19: las te sar gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T03D3792:43a-20: dge ba 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'o //
T03D3792:43a-21: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa bla ma'i skyon
T03D3792:43a-22: mi 'dzin pa'i phyir slob ma bzang po de cher
T03D3792:43a-23: gus pas bla ma la gus ldan no //
T03D3792:43a-24: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dus thams cad du bsnyen
T03D3792:43a-25: bkur la sogs pa byas pa yin par rig par
T03D3792:43a-26: bya'o // sems srung ba shes pa ni mkhas pa'o //
T03D3792:43a-27: ci'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya zhe na /
T03D3792:43a-28: lan du mkhas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:43a-29: gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen de rnams las
T03D3792:43a-30: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan 'byung bar
T03D3792:43a-31: 'gyur ro // des gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan
T03D3792:43a-32: pas slob ma dmigs pa'i ro myang ba med pas
T03D3792:43a-33: 'gyur ro // mkhas pa'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen
T03D3792:43a-34: de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3792:43a-36: de bas na sangs rgyas chos rnams ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T03D3792:43a-37: sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir yon tan gyi
T03D3792:43a-38: mchog dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten to zhes rgyal
T03D3792:43a-40: de bas na de bsnyen bkur bya ba yin par dgongs so //
T03D3792:43b-0: de dag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i 'dra ba zhig @43b ce na /
T03D3792:43b-1: sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:43b-2: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad bsdus pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa la zhugs te /
T03D3792:43b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams las byed
T03D3792:43b-4: pa po dang bya ba mi dmigs pas yin te
T03D3792:43b-5: / rang bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang
T03D3792:43b-6: po la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i ro myang ba
T03D3792:43b-7: spangs nas byang chub kyi rgyur yongs su bsngo bar
T03D3792:43b-8: / gyis shig pa'o // byang chub phung po ni
T03D3792:43b-9: zag pa med pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa tshul khrims
T03D3792:43b-10: kyi phung po la sogs pa'i rigs pas rnam par
T03D3792:43b-11: gzhag pa dpyad nas phyis rnam par dpyad pas nges
T03D3792:43b-12: pa na 'dzin par ma byed ce na /
T03D3792:43b-13: dang po'i las can de dag la rig pas nges
T03D3792:43b-14: par sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir dang po
T03D3792:43b-15: rab tu sbyor ba bstan pa de skad bstan par
T03D3792:43b-17: gzhan du na dad pa tsam yang med par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:43b-18: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa shes pa khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T03D3792:43b-19: mjug thogs su gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa
T03D3792:43b-20: la sbyor ba rnams kyi phan pa la sogs pa
T03D3792:43b-21: byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:43b-22: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:43b-23: de ltar shes pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes nas
T03D3792:43b-24: sbyor ba rnams bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis byang chub sems
T03D3792:43b-25: dpa'i spyod pa'i chos bstan pas ma 'ongs pa'i bden
T03D3792:43b-26: pa thob pa ni yon tan no //
T03D3792:43b-27: yon tan gyi tshogs rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir rgya mtsho'o //
T03D3792:43b-28: da ltar byung ba'i bde ba thob pas dga' ba'i phyir smra ba'i zla ba'o //
T03D3792:43b-29: yang dag par smin par mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid
T03D3792:43b-30: la 'jog par byed pa'i phyir don byed pas na
