T03D3792:47a-19: sogs pa yongs su bsngo zhing 'bras bu la sogs
T03D3792:47a-20: pa la ltos pa med pa'i sems kyis te /
T03D3792:47a-21: zang zing med par 'gro ba la chos kyi sbyin pa rjes su ston to //
T03D3792:47a-22: yang chos zab mo la the tshom med par gcig
T03D3792:47a-23: tu sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nges pas na dga'
T03D3792:47a-24: zhing ngo // byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid
T03D3792:47a-25: kyi las dang ldan pas snyan par smra bas tshig
T03D3792:47a-26: zhing ngo // 'jam ldan no // 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan te /
T03D3792:47a-27: rab ni yang dag pa ste /
T03D3792:47a-28: de ni gsal ba'i rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro bas shes pa'o //
T03D3792:47a-29: shes bzhin gyi srog chags la sogs pa mthong nas gsal ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:47a-30: gnya' shing gang tsam lta zhing 'gro ba'o //
T03D3792:47a-31: spyod lam tha dad pa'i g-yeng ba med pa'i phyir sems 'khrul med do //
T03D3792:47a-32: mi dge ba bcu'i las spangs pas na gtsang byas so //
T03D3792:47a-33: sna tshogs pa'i gos bzang po 'byor pas na gtsang ma'i gos 'chang ngo //
T03D3792:47a-34: mtshan la sogs pas brgyan pa'i lus dang ngag dang
T03D3792:47a-35: yid rnam par dag pa thob pas na gsum po
T03D3792:47a-37: ser sna la sogs pa'i sems mi bskyed pas na rnyed 'dod ma yin pa'o //
T03D3792:47b-0: thams cad du @47b chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i sbyor ba mi byed pas na khyu mchog go //
T03D3792:47b-1: 'gro ba la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dmyal ba
T03D3792:47b-2: la sogs par skye bar 'dod pas na rtag tu
T03D3792:47b-3: chos 'dod pa'o // rtogs pas chos nyid la yid ches pa'i phyir bdud kyi yul las 'das pa'o //
T03D3792:47b-4: bdud bcom pa'i gzugs nges par shes pas na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
T03D3792:47b-5: sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'i bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan de la mi gnas so //
T03D3792:47b-6: nges par 'byed pa'i cha la gnas pa'i phyir mi
T03D3792:47b-7: ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes la chos nyid goms
T03D3792:47b-8: par byas pas mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir
T03D3792:47b-9: mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid de rtogs pa yang lus
T03D3792:47b-10: dang ngag dang yid kyi bya bar brjod pa las
T03D3792:47b-11: yin par bstan par bzhed nas /
T03D3792:47b-12: grags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:47b-13: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'du shes las log pas na grags pa 'dod pa ma yin no //
T03D3792:47b-14: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa nyid kyis nyes
T03D3792:47b-15: pa thams cad med pa'i phyir khro bas sems dkrugs
T03D3792:47b-16: med do // bdag med pa rtogs pa dang sems
T03D3792:47b-17: can gyi don la thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis
T03D3792:47b-18: khyim par gyur na yang mngon par zhen pa med
T03D3792:47b-19: par longs spyod par byed de /
T03D3792:47b-20: dus thams cad du yul gyi nyes pa mthong bas
T03D3792:47b-21: tshangs par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir zhen pa med
T03D3792:47b-22: pas dngos po kun ma chags so //
T03D3792:47b-23: skyes bu dam pa'i chos nyid kyis 'tsho ba'i phyir
T03D3792:47b-24: yang bas nyo tshong la sogs pa longs spyod 'tsho
T03D3792:47b-26: de bzhin du sems can la gnod pa'i don du
T03D3792:47b-27: tsa munti la sogs pa'i mngon spyod kyi sngags dang
T03D3792:47b-28: sman pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa'i sngags
T03D3792:47b-29: bud med skyes bus dbang du sdud pa'i sbyor sngags
T03D3792:47b-30: tshol mi byed ces bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3792:47b-31: 'dod pa'i las can de byas par gyur pas skyes
T03D3792:47b-32: pa'am bud med du nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya
T03D3792:47b-33: ba la sogs pa lung ston par mi byed do
T03D3792:47b-34: // bden pa gnyis la brten pa'i phyir rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson /
T03D3792:47b-35: lus dang ngag gi khro ba dang bral ba'i phyir 'thab dang rtsod dang bral lo //
T03D3792:47b-36: sems can thams cad la bde ba phul du byung
T03D3792:47b-37: ba bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir byams pa'i
T03D3792:48a-1: stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phyir kun mkhyen 'dod do //
T03D3792:48a-2: chos cung zad kyang dmigs pa med pas rtag tu bstan pa la gzhol sems ldan no //
T03D3792:48a-3: rang 'dod pa'i skye ba der skye ba thob pas
T03D3792:48a-4: mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul mtha' rnam par
T03D3792:48a-5: spangs / rnam par spangs kyi sgra phyi ma dang
T03D3792:48a-6: yang 'brel pa'i phyir yul mtha' rnam par spangs te
T03D3792:48a-7: spangs / yul mtha'o // mngon par yid ches pas
T03D3792:48a-8: nges pa skyed pa'i phyir kun mkhyen gsum gyi bdag
T03D3792:48a-9: nyid ni rang gi sa la the tshom med pas
T03D3792:48a-11: nges pa'i rang bzhin la gnas pas rtag tu ri rab 'dra'o //
T03D3792:48a-12: mchog tu gzhol pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3792:48a-13: pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi phyir bsams nas gtong
T03D3792:48a-14: pa ni srog kyang 'dor zhing ngo //
T03D3792:48a-15: tshad ma dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rab tu brtson no //
T03D3792:48a-16: 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i phyogs tsam zhig brjod do //
T03D3792:48a-17: de yang rgyu tshogs pa yis 'bras skye bar //
T03D3792:48a-18: rjes su dpogs pa gang yin pa //
T03D3792:48a-19: don gzhan la ni mi ltos phyir //
T03D3792:48a-20: de ni rang bzhin yin par brjod //
T03D3792:48a-21: ces bya ba'i rigs pas 'dir bstan pa'i rtags kyang shes par bya'o //
T03D3792:48a-22: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:48a-23: pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam pa'i le'u ste
T03D3792:48a-26: // / de ltar bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir
T03D3792:48a-27: mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa na khyad par
T03D3792:48a-28: ma rtogs khyad par gzhan rtogs par mi 'gyur bas
T03D3792:48a-29: na rigs pa 'dis bsgom pa'i lam las re zhig
T03D3792:48a-30: khyad par bstan pa'i phyir gzugs dang zhes bya ba
T03D3792:48a-32: ji ltar de bzhin nyid zab pa de bzhin du
T03D3792:48a-33: de kho na nyid du gzugs ma skyes pas zab
T03D3792:48a-34: bo // de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
T03D3792:48a-37: rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid 'dis zab pa yin te /
T03D3792:48a-38: gzugs la sogs pa rnams gzugs la sogs par med de /
T03D3792:48a-39: sgro btags pa'i phyir med do //
T03D3792:48a-40: de bzhin du kun rdzob pa'i gzugs la sogs pa
T03D3792:48a-41: de dag kyang tha mal pa'i rang bzhin rigs pas
T03D3792:48a-42: mtshan ma ma lus pa spangs pas mtshan ma med
T03D3792:48a-43: pa'o // bslab pa thams cad zhi bas na rab zhi ba'o //
T03D3792:48b-0: 'dis @48b ni yang gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin
T03D3792:48b-1: nyid las gzhan ma yin pas skur pa 'debs pa
T03D3792:48b-3: dper na 'ba' zhig tshad ma rtogs pa mnga' 'phangs
T03D3792:48b-4: pa rgya mtsho'i gting la thug pa'i tshad tshol ba
T03D3792:48b-5: ltar / de bzhin du shes rab kyis ni sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T03D3792:48b-6: skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' dang bral ba nges par
T03D3792:48b-7: brtags na gang gi phyir brtags pas gting yod pa
T03D3792:48b-8: mi rnyed pas zab mo dang ldan pa ni zab
T03D3792:48b-9: pa ste / bsgom pa'i lam yin zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:48b-10: khyad par bstan pa 'di nyid rjes su bstan pa
T03D3792:48b-11: dang bcas pa khyad par can bsgom pa'i lam yin
T03D3792:48b-12: par ston pa na de'i byed pa'i sgo nas dris
T03D3792:48b-13: pa ni / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:48b-14: gang gi phyir bsgom pa'i lam gyi de kho na nyid du phung po dang /
T03D3792:48b-16: skye mched yod pa yin par yang dang yang du
T03D3792:48b-17: goms par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
T03D3792:48b-18: gi gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyi chos
T03D3792:48b-19: dang gang zag gi bdag med pa mngon sum du
T03D3792:48b-20: byas pas de ltar zab par gyur pa ni theg
T03D3792:48b-21: pa chen por don dam par dmigs pas gos pa
T03D3792:48b-22: med pa'o // gang zag de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
T03D3792:48b-23: de ji snyed skye ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs
T03D3792:48b-24: rab tu thob pa na yang dag par 'grub pa
T03D3792:48b-25: de las ci zhig yod par 'gyur zhes bya bar
T03D3792:48b-26: tshigs su bcad pa'i don sbyar ro //
T03D3792:48b-27: 'bras bu gsal bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:48b-28: dper na yul dman pa la lhag par chags pa'i
T03D3792:48b-29: phyir 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig
T03D3792:48b-30: / bud med dang lhan cig tu khyod che ge
T03D3792:48b-31: mor shog shig ces smras nas dus btab de dang
T03D3792:48b-33: snyam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa de
T03D3792:48b-34: lta bu'i rim pas rnam par rtog pa du ma
T03D3792:48b-35: ni sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa
T03D3792:48b-36: / ma phrad de / ste / dmigs pa la
T03D3792:48b-37: bsgribs nas nyin zhag thams cad du byung ba'i skyes
T03D3792:48b-38: bu'i rnam par rtog pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bskal
T03D3792:48b-39: par rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba 'khor bar 'gyur
T03D3792:48b-40: ba dor nas ji snyed kyi bsod nams dang ye
T03D3792:48b-41: shes kyi tshogs kyis byang chub 'thob pa de snyed
T03D3792:48b-42: kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsgom pa'i
T03D3792:49a-1: chub sems dpa' thob par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:49a-2: rnam par rtog pa chung ngu dang /
T03D3792:49a-4: chen po yangs pa'i rnam pa'i dbye bas bsgom pa'i lam rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
T03D3792:49a-5: 'dir bsdus nas brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir bsdus nas bstan par bya ste /
T03D3792:49a-6: de la yang lam chung dus ni rnam par rtog pa chen po spong la /
T03D3792:49a-7: chen pos ni rnam par rtog pa chung du spong ngo zhes bya bar gzung ste /
T03D3792:49a-8: de lta bu lam chen po la mi srid de /
T03D3792:49a-9: yang lam chen po skyes pa na nyon mongs pa chen po med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:49a-10: gzhan dag na re phyi ma phyi ma la bsod
T03D3792:49a-11: nams lhag par sgrub pa ni gnyen po'i dbye ba
T03D3792:49a-12: yin la / bsod nams zil gyis gnon par bstan
T03D3792:49a-13: pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dbye ba bstan
T03D3792:49a-14: pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T03D3792:49a-15: lam chung du bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:49a-16: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:49a-17: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong
T03D3792:49a-18: du dmigs pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas la sogs
T03D3792:49a-19: pa la sbyin pa byed cing zhes bya bar 'brel
T03D3792:49a-20: to // dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims
T03D3792:49a-21: srung byed kyang rgyal ba'i sras po gzhan zhig gis
T03D3792:49a-22: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ste /
T03D3792:49a-23: lam chung ngu'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang ldan zhing /
T03D3792:49a-24: de las langs nas yum 'di nyid ni chos so //
T03D3792:49a-25: ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la ston cing
T03D3792:49a-26: de sems can khyad par can sngon du 'gro bas
T03D3792:49a-27: chos kyi sbyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi bsod nams la
T03D3792:49a-28: ltos nas phra ba'i char yang mi phod pa ni
T03D3792:49a-29: bsod nams kyi char phod par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:49a-30: sbyin pa byed tshul khrims bsrung ba yang snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
T03D3792:49a-32: lam 'bring gi don bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:49a-33: byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:49a-34: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog ste /
T03D3792:49a-35: lam 'bring gi rang bzhin bsgom pa ste /
T03D3792:49a-36: de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing ngo //
T03D3792:49a-37: chos de yang 'gro ba mngon par mtho ba dang
T03D3792:49a-38: nges par legs par 'thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don
T03D3792:49a-39: te / rgyu'i gtso bo gter du gyur pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na'o //
T03D3792:49b-0: de bzhin du @49b chos kyi sbyin pa byin nas
T03D3792:49b-1: yongs su bsngo ba las byung ba'i dge ba gang
T03D3792:49b-2: yin pa dang ldan pa dang mnyam par gyur pas
T03D3792:49b-3: 'jig rten gsum na med ces bya bar sbyar ro
T03D3792:49b-4: // lam chen po bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:49b-5: bsod nams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:49b-6: ji skad bstan pa'i lam bsgom pa'i stobs kyis bsod nams de dag thams cad kyang gsog dang ste /
T03D3792:49b-7: de bzhin du brtags pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:49b-8: brtags pa'i chos kyis dben pas na gso ba dang /
T03D3792:49b-9: de bzhin nyid kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin pas ya ma brla dang /
T03D3792:49b-10: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob 'brel pa las skyes pa'i phyir yang ya ma brla'o //
T03D3792:49b-11: de bzhin du rtogs pa'i chos kyis dben pas na stong pa'o //
T03D3792:49b-12: de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin pas na gsob pa'o //
T03D3792:49b-13: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'brel pa la skye ba'i phyir ya ma brla'o //
T03D3792:49b-14: rgyu ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir snying po med par shes pa'o //
T03D3792:49b-15: de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyad spyod
T03D3792:49b-16: pa de ni lam chen po'i rang bzhin yin te
T03D3792:49b-17: / phyin ci ma log pa yin pa'i phyir spyod
T03D3792:49b-18: tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin
T03D3792:49b-19: / to // de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3792:49b-20: ma yin nam de'i stobs kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T03D3792:49b-21: dang gnyen po rim pa ji lta bzhin du spong
T03D3792:49b-22: / to // ba dang / thob pa mi rigs
T03D3792:49b-23: pas de'i phyir ji ltar rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi
T03D3792:49b-25: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:49b-26: brtags pa tsam gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'di ni ste /
T03D3792:49b-29: chen po'i rab tu dbye ba'o //
T03D3792:49b-30: chos thams cad ni rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i don phun sum tshogs pa byed par 'dod pa'o //
T03D3792:49b-31: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang /
T03D3792:49b-32: lung gi tshad mas nges pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa dang /
T03D3792:49b-34: rab tu bstan pa rnams rim pa bzhin no //
T03D3792:49b-35: byang chub sems dpa' gang gi thos pa la sogs
T03D3792:49b-36: pa'i shes pa bskyed pas bsgom pa'i lam goms pa'i
T03D3792:49b-37: shes pa la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang
T03D3792:49b-38: por brjod byas kyang de bzhin nyid du ro gcig
T03D3792:49b-39: pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings la rgyal ba'i sras de
T03D3792:50a-1: pa'i phyogs spangs pa med pas zad pa nyid med cing /
T03D3792:50a-2: gnyen po bskyed pa med pas de kho na nyid du 'phel ba med do //
T03D3792:50a-3: zhes bya ba ni grub pa sgrub pa yin no //
T03D3792:50a-4: de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis kun rdzob tu yin par dgongs so //
T03D3792:50a-5: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de
T03D3792:50a-6: bas na pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang de
T03D3792:50a-7: kho na nyid du nyams pa dang /
T03D3792:50a-8: 'phel ba med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:50a-9: rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:50a-10: shes rab 'ba' zhig la pha rol tu phyin pa brjod mod kyi /
T03D3792:50a-11: kyang gi sgras sbyin pa la sogs pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3792:50a-12: rgyal ba'i yum yin pas lnga po yang khyad par
T03D3792:50a-13: du 'phags pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin pha rol tu
T03D3792:50a-15: sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ming tsam mo //
T03D3792:50a-16: kun rdzob tu rdzas su gnas pas bla na med
T03D3792:50a-17: pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do
T03D3792:50a-20: rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
T03D3792:50a-21: pa de ni rtogs pa las nyams pa med pas
T03D3792:50a-22: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg
T03D3792:50a-23: 'gyur te / khyad par 'phags pa'i don nyid gsal bar byed pa ni sems bskyed pa yin no //
T03D3792:50a-24: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:50a-25: pa las stong pa nyid kyi le'u ste bcva brgyad
T03D3792:50a-27: / rim pa bzhin sems kyi skad cig ma snga
T03D3792:50a-28: ma ni rjes su 'gro ba med par zhig nas
T03D3792:50a-29: phyi ma skye bas phan tshun 'brel pa med pa'i
T03D3792:50a-30: phyir kun rdzob tu yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i
T03D3792:50a-31: don gsal bar byed pa ji ltar sems bskyed pa
T03D3792:50a-32: yin zhe na / don byed par dpe sngon du 'gro bas bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:50a-33: 'bru mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:50a-34: 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis //
T03D3792:50a-35: snying po tshig min la ste /
T03D3792:50a-36: skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:50a-37: dus mnyam pa yang lhan cig skyes pas khyad par
T03D3792:50a-38: med pa'i phyir bya ba dang byed pa'i ngo bo'i
T03D3792:50a-39: mtshan nyid bsreg par bya ba dang sreg par byed
T03D3792:50a-40: pa'i ngo bor mi rigs pas tshig pa ma yin
T03D3792:50a-41: no // me lce phyi ma'i skad cig mas kyang
T03D3792:50a-42: dang po de med par skad cig ma phyi ma
T03D3792:50b-0: ma skyes pa'i @50b phyir med pas de'i snying po
T03D3792:50b-1: no // mi tshig go // me lce phrad pa thams cad kyang snying po de tshig min te /
T03D3792:50b-2: dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:50b-3: yod na ni rtag tu yod par thal bar 'gyur
T03D3792:50b-4: bas kun rdzob tu yang skye ba med pa'i phyir
T03D3792:50b-5: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i mtshan nyid bsreg par
T03D3792:50b-6: bya ba dang / sreg par byed pa'i ngo bor
T03D3792:50b-7: yod par mi rigs pas phyi ma dang phrad pas
T03D3792:50b-9: me lce tha ma'i skad cig ma med par yang dang po'i skad cig mas tshig min te /
T03D3792:50b-10: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:50b-11: dang po'i skad cig ma med par me lce tha mas snying po tshig pa ma yin no //
T03D3792:50b-12: de bzhin du re re la nus pa med kyang
T03D3792:50b-13: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyis me
T03D3792:50b-14: lce dang po dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i snying
T03D3792:50b-15: po'i skad cig ma la ltos nas kun rdzob tu
T03D3792:50b-16: rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel pa'i phyir nus pa phul
T03D3792:50b-17: du byung ba nyid khyad par can me lce'i skad
T03D3792:50b-18: cig ma gnyis par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyu med
T03D3792:50b-20: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo mtshan nyid bsreg par bya ba dang /
T03D3792:50b-21: sreg par byed pa'i ngo bor yod pas snga ma
T03D3792:50b-22: dang phyi ma'i skad cig mas snying po tshig go
T03D3792:50b-23: zhes don gyis bstan par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:50b-24: dpe bstan nas skabs la bab pa'i don dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:50b-25: dang po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:50b-26: de bzhin du dang po'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3792:50b-27: byang chub thob par byed pa don ma lus pa
T03D3792:50b-28: so sor snang ba ma yin pas byang chub mchog
T03D3792:50b-30: de yang dang po'i sems kyis byang chub la reg
T03D3792:50b-31: pa'i rang bzhin du rnam pa tha ma med pa'i
T03D3792:50b-32: phyir med pas kyang nus pa ma yin la sems
T03D3792:50b-33: gnyis pa gang yin pa khyad par du phul du
T03D3792:50b-34: byung bar ma bskyed pa'i phyir thams cad tha ma'i
T03D3792:50b-35: sems bzhin du gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi
T03D3792:50b-37: sems gnyis pa de yis kyang byang chub la reg
T03D3792:50b-38: pa'i rang bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du med
T03D3792:50b-39: pa'i phyir ro // dang po'i sems kyang med pas na 'thob par nus pa ma yin te /
T03D3792:50b-40: khyad par phul du byung ba ma bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:50b-41: de bas na snying po tshig pa bzhin du snga
T03D3792:50b-42: ma dang phyi ma'i sems kyi skad cig ma dag
T03D3792:50b-43: gis byang chub thob bo zhes bstan par 'gyur ro
T03D3792:50b-44: // snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis kyi sems kyi
T03D3792:50b-45: skad cig rnams spyir byang chub thob pa'i rgyu yin
T03D3792:51a-1: da ni dang po'i skad cig ma nye bar len
T03D3792:51a-2: pa'i rgyu nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i
T03D3792:51a-3: sgo nas dpe sngon du 'gro bas bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3792:51a-4: / sa bon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:51a-5: rtag par ni rim dang cig car gyi don byed
T03D3792:51a-6: pa 'gal ba'i phyir skad cig mas byang chub kyi
T03D3792:51a-7: shing la sogs pa'i sa bon las phyi ma phyi
T03D3792:51a-8: ma'i skad cig ma yongs su 'gyur ba las sdong
T03D3792:51a-9: bu la sogs pa rgya cher bskyed nas rang gi
T03D3792:51a-10: ngo bo nges pa 'thob pa 'byung ngo //
T03D3792:51a-11: sa bon de yang sdong bu skyes pa na 'gag go //
T03D3792:51a-12: dang po de med na byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:51a-13: de bzhin du dang po'i sems gtso bo'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:51a-14: byang chub kyi gzhi dang po'i rgyu de nyid yongs
T03D3792:51a-15: su 'gyur ba'i phyir phyi ma sbyor ba las sangs
T03D3792:51a-16: rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa de dag sangs rgyas
T03D3792:51a-18: yang dang po de med na byang chub med par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:51a-19: sems kyi skad cig ma gnyis pa yang rgyu yin par gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:51a-20: sa bon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:51a-21: skad cig ma gnyis pa'i ngo bo nas dang s'a
T03D3792:51a-22: lu'i sa bon la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
T03D3792:51a-23: chos nyid kyi stobs kyis 'byung ste /
T03D3792:51a-24: 'bras bur gyur pa rnams dang s'a lu la sogs pa de dang de dag ste /
T03D3792:51a-25: sa bon de dag 'bras bu skye ba'i dus na med de /
T03D3792:51a-26: dmigs pa'i reg byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:51a-27: rnam pa thams cad du skad cig ma'i rgyun yang med do zhes nges par mi nus te /
T03D3792:51a-28: rgyu de dag dang mthun par 'bras bu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:51a-29: de bzhin du dang po'i sems skad cig ma'i stobs
T03D3792:51a-30: kyis skad cig ma gnyis pa'i sems bskyed de rgyal
T03D3792:51a-31: ba rnams kyi byang chub skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:51a-32: de kho na nyid du rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs par mi nus te /
T03D3792:51a-33: rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3792:51a-34: 'dir 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs par bya'o //
T03D3792:51a-35: rgya cher bstan nas nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:51a-36: chu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:51a-37: chu'i thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ma'i bar gyis nyung ngu nyung dus kyi bar te /
T03D3792:51a-38: dang po'i chu thigs pa rim pa phyi ma phyi
T03D3792:51a-39: ma dang bcas pas de yongs su 'gengs pa ltar
T03D3792:51a-40: / de bzhin du dang po'i sems kyang bla na med pa byang chub kyi rgyu yin te /
T03D3792:51b-0: rim gyis sems @51b kyi skad cig ma gnyis pa
T03D3792:51b-1: la sogs pa dang bcas pa sbyor ba'i lam la
T03D3792:51b-2: sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dkar po'i yon
T03D3792:51b-3: tan gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa'i phyir
T03D3792:51b-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:51b-5: zhar la byung ba rgya cher bstan nas /
T03D3792:51b-6: skabs la bab pa'i bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i
T03D3792:51b-7: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3792:51b-9: stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:51b-10: zab mo bskyed pa'i sbyor ba'i 'dzin pa yang ba'i phyir 'bras bu dang /
T03D3792:51b-11: rgyu dang rang bzhin dang bral bas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /
T03D3792:51b-13: smon pa med par chos thams cad rtogs pa'i byang
T03D3792:51b-14: chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa la mi
T03D3792:51b-15: reg ste / snying rje dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:51b-16: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir mtshan mar mi spyod pa'o //
T03D3792:51b-17: dper na skyes bu mnyan pa shin tu bslabs pa'i
T03D3792:51b-18: phyir mkhas par gyur pa gnod pa med par phar
T03D3792:51b-20: zong thogs nas phar 'gro zhing tshur 'ong bar byed
T03D3792:51b-21: kyang mtha' gnyis kar mi gnas shing ltung ba'i gnas
T03D3792:51b-23: rgya mtsho der yang gnas pa med pa bzhin no zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don sbyar ro //
T03D3792:51b-24: phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid brjod pa las slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bstan nas /
T03D3792:51b-25: de'i rjes la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3792:51b-26: rnam par byang ba'i rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir gnyi
T03D3792:51b-27: ga mnyam par rtogs pa ni mi slob par 'gyur
T03D3792:51b-28: ba yin te / bslab par bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:51b-29: de lta bu'i mi slob pa'i dge 'dun gsal bar
T03D3792:51b-30: bya ba'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
T03D3792:51b-31: pa mnyam par bstan pa ni de ltar zhes bya
T03D3792:51b-32: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:51b-33: bstan ma thag pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3792:51b-34: rtogs pa'i 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3792:51b-35: mnyam par bsgom pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3792:51b-36: dpa' rnam par byang ba'i rtogs pa spangs pa nyid
T03D3792:51b-37: kyis 'di snyam du bdag stobs bcus lung bstan byang
T03D3792:51b-38: chub reg 'gyur rlom sems med do //
T03D3792:51b-39: byang chub kyi rgyu mtshan gyis skrag pa med de /
T03D3792:51b-40: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs
T03D3792:51b-41: pa'i phyir de bas na chos thams cad ma skyes
T03D3792:52a-1: dag sgyu ma lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos
T03D3792:52a-2: po yod par cung zad kyang ma skyes so zhes
T03D3792:52a-3: de ltar spyad pa spyod pa ni bde gshegs shes
T03D3792:52a-4: rab ste / gnyi ga mnyam par rtogs pa ni spyod pa yin no //
T03D3792:52a-5: gnyi ga mnyam par bsgoms pas sangs rgyas su gyur
T03D3792:52a-6: nas de ma thag tu rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3792:52a-7: zhing sems can dang snod kyi dbye bas sangs rgyas
T03D3792:52a-8: kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis rnam par dag par bstan
T03D3792:52a-9: pa'i phyir / 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:52a-12: nad dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni nye bar mtshon pa nyid yin te /
T03D3792:52a-13: gzhan yang sems can dang snod du gyur pa'i log
T03D3792:52a-14: par rtogs pa'i gnas mthong nas ji ltar bdag gis
T03D3792:52a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis sbyang bar bya'o
T03D3792:52a-16: snyam pa de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa med
T03D3792:52a-17: de / sring mo gang g'a'i lha mo bzhin du
T03D3792:52a-18: skrag pa med par byang chub sems dpa' bzlog pas
T03D3792:52a-19: de / na / yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
T03D3792:52a-20: pa gnyis yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir go gyon te
T03D3792:52a-21: de / na / / phyi ma'i mu'i mtha' rtag
T03D3792:52a-22: tu yul la brtson zhing de'i thabs yongs su shes
T03D3792:52a-23: pa'i phyir rab tu shes nas so //
T03D3792:52a-24: yongs su skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skyed mi byed do //
T03D3792:52a-25: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:52a-26: pa las gang g'a'i lha mo'i le'u ste bcu dgu
T03D3792:52a-28: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas
T03D3792:52a-29: nas thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba ji srid kyi
T03D3792:52a-30: bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i rang gi sangs
T03D3792:52a-31: rgyas kyi zhing gi bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa
T03D3792:52a-32: bstan nas de'i yul re zhig bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:52a-33: byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:52a-34: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing //
T03D3792:52a-35: phung po 'di dag gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T03D3792:52a-36: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis shes shing gdod nas stong pas
T03D3792:52a-37: khyad par du 'gro ba med do zhes bya bar
T03D3792:52a-38: dgongs so // de lta bas na sgyu ma lta
T03D3792:52a-39: bur stong pa nyid thabs la mkhas pa'i yul yin
T03D3792:52a-41: yang ci'i phyir goms par byas pas khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3792:52a-42: de'i lan du thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba bstan
T03D3792:52a-43: pa'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag ces bya ba la
T03D3792:52b-0: ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid @52b bsgoms pas yang
T03D3792:52b-1: 'gro ba'i don byed cing ye shes mnyam par bzhag
T03D3792:52b-3: mnyam par snying rje sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:52b-4: sems can gyi khams la bltas nas de ltar snying
T03D3792:52b-5: rje dang shes rab gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa'i
T03D3792:52b-7: mngon sum bya ba'i dus dang dus ma yin pa
T03D3792:52b-8: la sbyor ba'i stobs kyis yongs su ma nyams par
T03D3792:52b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
T03D3792:52b-10: sogs pa thob pa ni sbyor ba yin no zhes
T03D3792:52b-11: bstan to // de la re zhig par chad byed
T03D3792:52b-12: pa'i chos las 'da' ba'i thabs dpe sngon du 'gro
T03D3792:52b-13: bas bstan pa'i phyir dper na zhes bya ba la
T03D3792:52b-15: dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la bzo bas na mkhas pa'o //
T03D3792:52b-16: dpa' ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis brgyan pas na yon tan kun ldan zhing ngo //
T03D3792:52b-17: lus kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir stobs ldan no //
T03D3792:52b-18: gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir mi thub pa'o //
T03D3792:52b-19: 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir brtson byas so //
T03D3792:52b-20: gzhan 'dun par byed pa'i thabs lus la sogs pa'i
T03D3792:52b-21: rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa la goms pa'i phyir
T03D3792:52b-23: 'phong legs par bslab pa'i phyir 'phong gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3792:52b-24: ri mo la sogs pa'i las kyi gnas kyi bya ba la mkhas pa'i phyir bzo gnas mang ba'o //
T03D3792:52b-25: ma rungs pa'i skye bo mang po slu ba la
T03D3792:52b-26: gcig tu mkhas pa'i phyir sgyu ma sgrub pa'i cho
T03D3792:52b-27: ga shes pa'o // skye bo dam pa yongs su
T03D3792:52b-28: bskyang ba gtsor byed pas na 'gro don rab tu
T03D3792:52b-29: ga shes pa'o // 'dod pa'o // de lta bu
T03D3792:52b-30: de yang dgra'i gnod pa yod pa 'ga' zhig tu
T03D3792:52b-31: pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas te /
T03D3792:52b-32: bu dang bu mo yongs su bsdus nas /
T03D3792:52b-33: dgra byed mang pos 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa ste /
T03D3792:52b-34: phyin pa na dgra mang po 'ongs pa la de'i
T03D3792:52b-35: sgyu ma'i sgrub pa shes pas srog la ltos pa
T03D3792:52b-37: gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas na rtul phod pa'o //
T03D3792:52b-38: skyes bu mang po mngon par sprul te /
T03D3792:52b-39: bar chad byed pa mang po las 'das nas dgon pa las brgal te /
T03D3792:52b-40: bde bar phyin cing gnyug ma'i khyim du phyir 'ong ba ltar /
T03D3792:52b-41: de bzhin de tshe ni gang gi tshe ste /
T03D3792:53a-0: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa @53a * //
T03D3792:53a-1: yang dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa mngon sum du
T03D3792:53a-2: thob pas byams pas bde ba la sbyor bar 'dod
T03D3792:53a-3: pa'i sems kyi rkyen gyis sems can gyi khams kun
T03D3792:53a-4: la mngon du phyogs pa dang 'brel pa de'i tshe
T03D3792:53a-5: 'di ltar lha'i bu la sogs pa'i bdud bzhi las
T03D3792:53a-6: 'das shing nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyis gnyis las
T03D3792:53a-7: kyang rab 'das nas sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i
T03D3792:53a-8: ting nge 'dzin mchog la gnas shing /
T03D3792:53a-9: byang chub reg par mi byed de /
T03D3792:53a-10: bya ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:53a-11: mi gnas pas gnas pa'i thabs dang dpe sngon du
T03D3792:53a-12: 'gro bas bstan pa'i phyir mkha' la zhes bya ba
T03D3792:53a-14: dper na 'jig rten chags pa na rim pa bzhin du brten te /
T03D3792:53a-16: rlung dang bcas pa la chu'i phung po'o //
T03D3792:53a-17: de la yang gser gyis gzhi'o //
T03D3792:53a-18: de la yang sa chen po /
T03D3792:53a-19: de la gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams brten to //
T03D3792:53a-20: de nas sems can gyi longs spyod chags te /
T03D3792:53a-21: de 'dra ste rtsa ba'i rgyu las yin par blta bar bya'o //
T03D3792:53a-22: gzhan du na dngos po thams cad kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid nam mkha' ji ltar gnas su 'gyur /
T03D3792:53a-23: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang la gnas yin te /
T03D3792:53a-25: 'on kyang de gnas yin par grags te /
T03D3792:53a-26: rab tu grags pa'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i rgyu'i
T03D3792:53a-27: stobs kyis nges pa 'byung ba 'di yid la byed
T03D3792:53a-28: pas nam mkha'i khams kyi don 'di bsam par gyis
T03D3792:53a-29: shig /'di ltar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3792:53a-30: stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i sbyor bas /
T03D3792:53a-31: 'gro la sems can gyi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin snang ba dang /
T03D3792:53a-32: rang gi smon nas shes pa'i rgyu de gnyis tsam gyi byin gyi rlabs can ni rten can no //
T03D3792:53a-33: bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs ni bya ba du
T03D3792:53a-34: ma byed cing sprul pa'i sku ni rnam pa sna
T03D3792:53a-35: tshogs pa'i bya ba du ma ston par byed cing
T03D3792:53a-36: ngo // ji skad bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i
T03D3792:53a-37: stobs kyis mya ngan las 'das la mi reg par
T03D3792:53a-38: dngos po'i mtshan nyid las 'das pas stong pa nyid
T03D3792:53a-40: de bas na de nyid gnas par gyur pa yin zhes bya'o //
T03D3792:53a-41: sngon gyi smon lam yang mi 'dor ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:53a-42: gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:53a-43: gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba /
T03D3792:53b-0: chos thams @53b cad mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid kyi mchog de nyid dang /
T03D3792:53b-1: rnam par g-yeng ba ma lus pa nye bar zhi bas na zhi ba'o //
T03D3792:53b-2: dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni 'di spyod pa'o //
T03D3792:53b-3: de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang stong pa nyid kyi
T03D3792:53b-4: rang bzhin gnyis kyi bar skabs der byang chub sems
T03D3792:53b-5: dpa' gnas te / stong pa nyid kyi stobs kyi mtshan ma rab tu sgom mi byed /
T03D3792:53b-6: 'di la mtshan ma med de ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis gnas par gyur pa'o //
T03D3792:53b-7: ji skad bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis
T03D3792:53b-8: gang 'dod pa bzhin du mtha' gnyis su mi ltung
T03D3792:53b-9: ngo // rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mya
T03D3792:53b-10: ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i 'dzin pa
T03D3792:53b-12: 'khor ba la mngon par zhen pa spangs pas na rab zhi ba'o //
T03D3792:53b-13: spyod pa ni mtshan ma med pa la spyod par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3792:53b-14: mthun mong ma yin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:53b-15: bar snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:53b-16: dper na bar snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas ni

T03D3792:60a-25: phul du byung ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gnas par
T03D3792:60a-26: gyur na de'i tshe sems can bde ba la brtson
T03D3792:60a-27: pa lta ci smos zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro
T03D3792:60a-28: lta ci smos / ro // la brtson te /
T03D3792:60a-29: // // yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs
T03D3792:60a-31: brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T03D3792:60a-33: // / de ltar gnyen po shin tu 'phel bas rang
T03D3792:60a-34: gi spyod yul las 'das pas bdud brtson pa chen
T03D3792:60a-35: po byed par bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:60a-36: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:60a-37: gang gi tshe gnyen po skyes pa de'i tshe bdud ni zug rdu ldan par 'gyur te /
T03D3792:60a-41: yid mi bde ba thob pa dang /
T03D3792:60a-42: zug rngu dang mya ngan gyi don gyis sdug bsngal te /
T03D3792:60a-43: de nyid kyi phyir yid mi bde nyam chung bar 'gyur //
T03D3792:60a-44: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnyen po sgom pa las 'di yid nur 'gyur zhing /
T03D3792:60a-45: 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams sreg cing skar mda' gtong mod kyi /
T03D3792:60a-46: de lta na yang bar chad byed mi nus so //
T03D3792:60a-47: gang zhig la mi nus she na /
T03D3792:60a-48: lan du gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:60b-0: gang gi tshe mkhas par gyur @60b pa'i snying rje
T03D3792:60b-1: phun sum tshogs pa yang dag pa'i bsam pa dang
T03D3792:60b-2: yang dag par rab tu ldan pas nyin mtshan shes
T03D3792:60b-3: rab pha rol phyin pa mchog bsgom pa'i stobs kyis
T03D3792:60b-4: don la lta ba de'i tshe shes rab dang snying
T03D3792:60b-5: rje goms pas lus sems ni nye bar mtshan pa'i
T03D3792:60b-7: mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya dang mtshungs pa nyid kyis
T03D3792:60b-8: mnyam pa gang cung zad la yang mi gnas par
T03D3792:60b-9: gyur pa la nag po'i las kyi grogs byed pa'i
T03D3792:60b-10: phyir nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis glags rnyed ga
T03D3792:60b-11: la 'gyur te / yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:60b-12: lam la yang dag par ma zhugs pa la ni nus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:60b-13: gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:60b-14: gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang gi gnas su ngag gi rtsod pa ni 'thab pa'o //
T03D3792:60b-15: rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs par song nas 'thab pa ni rtsod pa'o //
T03D3792:60b-16: phan tshun sdang bar nye bar gnas pa ni 'gal ba'o //
T03D3792:60b-17: khro bas skyed pa'i sems ma rungs par spyod pa dang ldan par gyur ba'o //
T03D3792:60b-18: des 'jug pa thob pas bdud ni dga' 'gyur zhing /
T03D3792:60b-19: de nyid mchog tu nyams pa bder 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:60b-20: yang de gnyis 'thab mo la sogs pa byed pas
T03D3792:60b-21: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyal ba'i shes rab las
T03D3792:60b-23: de bzhin du de gnyis phan pa dang phan pa ma yin pa thob pa dang /
T03D3792:60b-24: spong ba'i thabs dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3792:60b-25: chos rnams las ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra
T03D3792:60b-26: bar 'gyur ro // de bas na yang de gnyi
T03D3792:60b-27: ga bkag pa'i 'thab mo la sogs pa byed cing
T03D3792:60b-28: bdag nyid bstod pas dam bcas pa nyams pa byed
T03D3792:60b-29: bar 'gyur ro // par 'gyur / gang gi tshe
T03D3792:60b-30: zhe sdang shas che bas mi bzad pas gzhan gnod
T03D3792:60b-31: pa byed pa mi bzod cing bzod dang bral la
T03D3792:60b-33: de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te mang po dga' bar 'gyur te /
T03D3792:60b-34: bdud kyi phyogs ni bdud kyi sde chos ma yin
T03D3792:60b-35: pa 'thab mo la sogs pa byed pa yin no
T03D3792:60b-36: // 'on ji lta bus byang chub thob ce na /
T03D3792:60b-37: lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis //
T03D3792:60b-38: lung ma bstan pa de ni nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:60b-39: lung bstan thob pa la yang sems khros pa la
T03D3792:60b-40: sogs pas bskyed cing sun dbyung ba'i sems kyis rtsod
T03D3792:60b-41: pa rtsom byed cing bshags pa la sogs pa mi
T03D3792:61a-1: ba'i bsod nams mi skye bas na tha ba skyon ldan no //
T03D3792:61a-2: sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa dang ldan pa
T03D3792:61a-3: de snyed kyi bskal par 'thab mo la sogs pa'i
T03D3792:61a-4: sdig pa bsal ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3792:61a-5: gnyen po thob par bya ba'i phyir yang ngo //
T03D3792:61a-6: sangs rgyas nyid mi gtong bar 'gyur bas gzhi nas go cha bgo dgos so //
T03D3792:61a-7: 'di lta bus byang chub 'thob pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T03D3792:61a-9: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:61a-10: sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub
T03D3792:61a-11: reg / de snyam du bsams nas 'thab mo la
T03D3792:61a-12: sogs pa byed pa ni byang chub kyi bgegs yin
T03D3792:61a-13: pa'i phyir ro // sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing //
T03D3792:61a-14: sdig pa bshags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa las so
T03D3792:61a-15: sor bshags par byed cing gang su yang rung ba
T03D3792:61a-16: las phyis kyang mi byed pa'i sdom pa nod par
T03D3792:61a-17: byed pa ste / nges par byas nas thabs kyis sam /
T03D3792:61a-18: gang zag de nyid la mgu bar byed pas sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob ste /
T03D3792:61a-19: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam la mkhas zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3792:61a-20: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:61a-21: pa las mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi le'u ste nyi
T03D3792:61a-22: shu rtsa bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
T03D3792:61a-25: // / nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal sngar dgag pa byas nas /
T03D3792:61a-26: de bzhin du bslab pa yongs su sbyang ba yongs su bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:61a-27: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:61a-28: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sangs rgyas nyid la
T03D3792:61a-29: sogs pa'i bslab pa la slob pa'i tshe don dam
T03D3792:61a-30: par gang yang bslab par bya ba'i rang bzhin nam
T03D3792:61a-31: / slob pa po'i bdag nyid de byed pa po'i rang bzhin nam /
T03D3792:61a-32: bslab par bya ba'i las kyi rang bzhin rnams mi dmigs pa ni nye bar mtshon pa nyid de /
T03D3792:61a-35: bslab par mi bya ba'i chos su mi rtog cing /
T03D3792:61a-36: de bzhin du bslab pa dang /
T03D3792:61a-37: bslab pa ma yin pa 'di gnyis 'khor gsum du
T03D3792:61a-38: rnam par dag pa ste mi rtog pas kun rdzob
T03D3792:61a-39: tu slob ste / phan pa dang phan pa ma
T03D3792:61a-40: yin pa thob pa dang spang ba'i phyir de ltar
T03D3792:61a-41: gang slob de ni sangs rgyas thob par byed pa
T03D3792:61a-42: dge ba bcu la sogs pa ni chos 'dir slob
T03D3792:61a-43: pa ni phul du byung bar gyur pa'o //
T03D3792:61b-0: @61b de nyid tshul khrims 'chal ba dang bral ba
T03D3792:61b-1: ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa'i chos sgrub par
T03D3792:61b-2: byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:61b-3: byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:61b-4: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta bu'i bden
T03D3792:61b-5: pa gnyis kyi rim pa las ma 'das par bstan
T03D3792:61b-6: ma thag pa'i bslab pa 'di shes pa de ni
T03D3792:61b-7: gzhan yang sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang
T03D3792:61b-8: ba med pas bslab nyams tshul khrims 'chal mi 'gyur
T03D3792:61b-9: / de ni sangs rgyas chos mnyes bya phyir 'di ni 'di la slob po //
T03D3792:61b-10: bden pa gnyis la brten nas rim pa ji lta
T03D3792:61b-11: ba bzhin du slob pa ni bslab lhag bslab la
T03D3792:61b-12: mkhas te dngos por dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir
T03D3792:61b-14: de nyid gang yin zhe na /
T03D3792:61b-15: mkhas pa 'od byed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:61b-16: mkhas pa ni shes rab can te /
T03D3792:61b-17: bden pa gnyis la brten nas ye shes kyi 'od mnga' ba'i phyir 'od byed do //
T03D3792:61b-18: dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang skyed mi byed /
T03D3792:61b-19: nye ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i ste /
T03D3792:61b-20: bar snang la 'od zer brgya phrag bkye bas /
T03D3792:61b-21: mdun gyi bar snang la ni mun pa mi ga nas bzhin /
T03D3792:61b-22: de bzhin du ji skad bstan pa'i bslab pa la
T03D3792:61b-23: slob pas yon tan skyed do zhes bya bar dgongs
T03D3792:61b-24: so // sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bslab par bya ba gzhan dag yod pa ma yin nam /
T03D3792:61b-25: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la slob par bstan zhe na /
T03D3792:61b-26: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:61b-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na
T03D3792:61b-28: la bslab par byas pa rnams kyi chos thams cad
T03D3792:61b-29: khong du chud pa'i rnal 'byor legs par sbyangs pas
T03D3792:61b-30: rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis 'khor dang bcas pa la
T03D3792:61b-31: bslabs pa yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3792:61b-32: lhag ma thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur te
T03D3792:61b-33: / tshangs pa'i dra bas zhus pa'i mdo las /
T03D3792:61b-34: ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus par bstan te /
T03D3792:61b-36: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3792:61b-37: la sogs pa 'di dag 'khor gsum rnam par dag
T03D3792:61b-38: pa la goms par byas pas shes rab kyi pha
T03D3792:61b-39: rol tu phyin par 'dus par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:61b-40: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas bstan nas ldog pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:62a-2: dper na skye ba snga mas 'phangs pa'i tshe 'gag pa ni srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'o //
T03D3792:62a-3: dbang po ji snyed yod pa dmigs pa dbang po'i grong gi tshogs de dag 'gag par 'gyur te /
T03D3792:62a-5: de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa byang chub
T03D3792:62a-6: sems dpa' mchog rnams kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3792:62a-7: ji skad bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams
T03D3792:62a-8: cad ni de'i stobs kyis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir
T03D3792:62a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na
T03D3792:62a-11: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3792:62a-12: pa kho na la bslab par ston to zhes bya
T03D3792:62a-13: bar dgongs so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3792:62a-14: phyin pa la bslabs pas thams cad bslabs pa yin
T03D3792:62a-15: bar dgongs so // na / nyan thos nyid la
T03D3792:62a-16: sogs pa'i yon tan yang 'byung bas de dag skyon
T03D3792:62a-17: nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
T03D3792:62a-18: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:62a-19: nyan thos kyi yon tan thob pa'i lam la sogs pa gang dag yin pa dang /
T03D3792:62a-20: de bzhin du rang rgyal rnams kyi yon tan kun
T03D3792:62a-21: la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa des 'dul ba'i
T03D3792:62a-22: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi don
T03D3792:62a-23: du slob par byed pa nyid yin gyi /
T03D3792:62a-24: yang de la mi gnas te /
T03D3792:62a-25: de bzhin du 'dod pa yang mi skyed de /
T03D3792:62a-26: nyan thos la sogs pa'i yon tan 'di ni gzhan
T03D3792:62a-27: gyi don du bslab bya yin snyam nas de'i phyir
T03D3792:62a-28: slob kyi / don de nyid mngon du byed pas skyon ma yin no //
T03D3792:62a-29: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:62a-30: pa las bslab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga
T03D3792:62a-33: / rnam par 'phel ba de lta bu'i 'phel ba'i brtan pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:62a-34: mi ldog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:62a-35: gang gi tshe phyir mi ldog pa'i khyad par byang
T03D3792:62a-36: chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3792:62a-37: dpa' gang zhig snying rje chen po sems can gyi
T03D3792:62a-38: don du sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la bsam
T03D3792:62a-39: pa thag pas yi rang ba de'i tshe stong gsum
T03D3792:62a-40: gyi stong chen po'i ri rab srang la gzhal bas
T03D3792:62a-42: rgyal ba'i sras kyi dge ba la rjes su yi
T03D3792:62a-43: rang ba'i brtan pa'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus
T03D3792:62a-45: nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir chos gzhan dag
T03D3792:62b-0: la yang bstan pa'i tshad @62b nye bar gzung bar
T03D3792:62b-1: mi nus so // bstan pa de lta bus brtan pa'i sems gnas pa brjod par brtan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:62b-2: dge ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:62b-3: tshogs kyi lam la sogs pa ni dge ba'i don gnyer ro //
T03D3792:62b-4: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ni phan par 'dod pa'o //
T03D3792:62b-5: sems can ji snyed pa kun gyi bsod nams phung po ji snyed pa la'ang yi rang 'gyur /
T03D3792:62b-6: de'i phyir de dag bsod nams lhag pa'i rang bzhin
T03D3792:62b-7: sems brtan pa thob pas sems can gyi don du
T03D3792:62b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis rgyal ba'i yon tan
T03D3792:62b-9: rjes su thob par gyur nas /
T03D3792:62b-10: phyin ci log ma lus pa'i sdug bsngal zad par
T03D3792:62b-11: bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten te 'gro la chos sbyin
T03D3792:62b-12: byed / 'dir yang rtags la sogs pa rim pa
T03D3792:62b-13: ji lta ba bzhin du rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs
T03D3792:62b-14: pa'i dro ba la sogs pa nges par 'byed pa'i
T03D3792:62b-15: cha bzhi'i rang bzhin yin no //
T03D3792:62b-16: nges par 'byed pa'i cha'i rjes la mthong ba'i lam yin te /
T03D3792:62b-17: de la yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3792:62b-18: gzung ba dang 'dzin pas rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3792:62b-19: yang 'di spong bar byed pa'i gnyen po dang blang
T03D3792:62b-20: bar bya ba yin pa la thams cad 'jug pa'i
T03D3792:62b-21: phyogs kyi rten can gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3792:62b-22: dang po spang bar bya ba bstan par bzhed nas
T03D3792:62b-23: / byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:62b-24: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mthong ba'i lam la
T03D3792:62b-25: sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na ji skad bstan pa'i rnam
T03D3792:62b-26: par rtog pa spangs pas mi rtog pa'o //
T03D3792:62b-27: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang bral ba'i phyir chos rnams
T03D3792:62b-28: kun stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa yongs su
T03D3792:62b-29: shes pa dang / sgro btags pas chos thams cad
T03D3792:62b-30: dben pa'i phyir spros pa med pa de nyid yongs
T03D3792:62b-31: su shes pa de ni shes rab ji skad bstan
T03D3792:62b-32: pas rnam par rtog pa gnyis kyi rnam pas byang
T03D3792:62b-33: chub tshol bar mi byed do //
T03D3792:62b-34: rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba gang yin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3792:62b-35: mthong ba'i lam yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'o //
T03D3792:62b-36: mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog go //
T03D3792:62b-37: thams cad zlog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can bzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa spangs pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:62b-38: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:63a-0: dper na nam mkha'i khams dang nam @63a * //
T03D3792:63a-1: mkha' lhan cig tu phan tshun spangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba med do //
T03D3792:63a-2: gang gi nam mkha'i khams de dang ni nam mkha'
T03D3792:63a-3: der yul 'ga' zhig tu rnam pa 'gas 'gal ba
T03D3792:63a-5: gang gi sgras 'phangs pa'i brjod par bya ba ni
T03D3792:63a-6: rang la rang byed pa 'gal bas mi srid do
T03D3792:63a-8: de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin shes
T03D3792:63a-9: rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang rnam par
T03D3792:63a-10: mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir nam mkha'
T03D3792:63a-12: mthong ba'i lam gyi sems dang sems las byung ba
T03D3792:63a-13: 'jug pa'i gnas skabs na ji skad bstan pa'i rnam
T03D3792:63a-14: par rtog pa spangs nas nye bar zhi ba spyod
T03D3792:63a-15: par 'gyur te / de bas na de nyid kyis
T03D3792:63a-16: gang dang yang lhan cig tu cung zad kyang 'gal
T03D3792:63a-17: par 'gyur te / ba med do // gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa bstan nas /
T03D3792:63a-18: de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa brjod
T03D3792:63a-19: par bya ba yin pas skyes bu rdzas su yod
T03D3792:63a-20: pa'i rten can 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang
T03D3792:63a-21: po spang bar bya ba nyid du rig par bya
T03D3792:63a-22: ba'i phyir / skye bo'i dbus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:63a-23: dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i skyes bu
T03D3792:63a-24: 'di snyam du nye bar gnas pa'i skyes bu ltad
T03D3792:63a-25: mo pa'i tshogs 'di dag mgu bar bya'o snyam du
T03D3792:63a-26: mi sems te / rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:63a-27: de yang sprul pa de nyid skyes bu'i khyad par
T03D3792:63a-28: gyi don snang ba'i shes pa bskyed nas mngon pa'i
T03D3792:63a-29: nga rgyal gyis de nyid bya ba byed par lta
T03D3792:63a-30: pa pos mthong ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi
T03D3792:63a-31: stobs kyis bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed pa
T03D3792:63a-32: mthong yang / gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir /
T03D3792:63a-33: yang sprul pa'i skyes bu de la lus med sems
T03D3792:63a-34: med ngag gi rang bzhin yang med ming yang yod
T03D3792:63a-36: de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam gyi sbyor ba'i gnas
T03D3792:63a-37: skabs ni shes rab spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3792:63a-38: nam yang byang chub rtogs nas 'gro ba la chos
T03D3792:63a-39: ston pa la sogs pas yongs su dgrol mi sems
T03D3792:63a-40: / de lta bas na yang lha la sogs pa'i

T03D3792:63b-46: rnam par rtog pa bzhi spangs pa la spyod pa

T03D3792:64a-0: pa gsungs te / la @64a * // sogs pa'i

T03D3792:64a-6: pa'i phreng ba yongs su brjod par mdzad do //

T03D3792:64a-19: pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi stobs kyis stong pa

T03D3792:64a-25: phun sum tshogs pas na bde gshegs byin rlabs can

T03D3792:64a-27: tshig nyams pa med pas na mkhas pa'o //

T03D3792:64a-31: zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don sbyar ro //
T03D3792:64a-32: da ni rgyu gang dang bcas pas mthong ba'i lam
T03D3792:64a-33: byang chub chen po thob par byed pa'i yum de
T03D3792:64a-34: bstan pa'i phyir / de bzhin gshegs yum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T03D3792:64b-0: / / shes rab kyi pha rol @64b tu phyin

T03D3792:64b-10: pa yod par dpe sngon du 'gro bas rtogs par

T03D3792:64b-12: dper na chos kyi dbyings nyid nam mkha'i khams kyi
T03D3792:64b-13: de bzhin nyid la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir gnas
T03D3792:64b-14: par mi 'gyur ba nyid ni gnas med do //

T03D3792:64b-29: rten 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa sgro btags pa

T03D3792:64b-32: 'dzin pa rnam par rtog par gzhag pa la yang

T03D3792:64b-41: so zhes bya bar dgongs so //

T03D3792:65a-38: / 'dod pa'o // sprul pa'i sku chos kyi mchog
T03D3792:65a-39: sbyin par 'dod pa ni rim pa ji lta ba

T03D3792:65b-28: thob pas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir
T03D3792:65b-29: chos kyi gter gyi mchog go //

T03D3792:66a-1: rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i rang bzhin nyid

T03D3792:66b-4: bya ba la sogs pa dam pa dang ldan pa

T03D3792:66b-6: pa nyid la sogs pa de dag thams cad bkag

T03D3792:66b-14: ma rig 'khrul 'khor de ni zad med 'phel ba med //
T03D3792:66b-15: sngon ma byung ba'i sems can rab tu 'byung bar

T03D3792:66b-23: de kun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog ni bsgom pa'i lam ste /

T03D3792:66b-28: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa goms par byas pa'i

T03D3792:67a-38: pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis spangs te /

T03D3792:67b-9: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir de lta bu'i

T03D3792:67b-19: nas ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa

T03D3792:67b-28: rgyal rigs la sogs par skye'o //
T03D3792:67b-29: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rjes la bar chad med pa'i
T03D3792:67b-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi don dpe sngon du 'gro bas
T03D3792:67b-31: bstan pa'i phyir / dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:67b-32: dper na 'dzam bu gling mi zhig sngon chad lha
T03D3792:67b-33: yul de nam yang lha'i yul gzhan 'phul dbang byed

T03D3792:68a-1: chags par mi byed ltar te /

T03D3792:68a-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3792:68a-4: thob pa'i yon tan gyi gzhi de nyid khyad par
T03D3792:68a-6: bsam gtan dmigs pa med pa dang /

T03D3792:68a-15: la gnas pa nyid kyis byis pa'i chos sbyin pa
T03D3792:68a-16: la sogs pa dmigs pa'i chos mi gnas so //
T03D3792:68a-17: 'dir yang gnas par rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir byang
T03D3792:68a-18: chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ma gtogs pa

T03D3792:68a-28: chub sems dpa' brten par mi byed do //

T03D3792:68b-6: rang la dgos pa med la /

T03D3792:68b-9: shing / blangs nas khyim du song nas chags pa med par rang gi gnyen rnams la dgod do //

T03D3792:68b-12: bsam gtan bzhi po nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa

T03D3792:68b-15: bde ba sbyin zhing de la chags pa med par
T03D3792:68b-16: gyur pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid
T03D3792:68b-18: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye pas rim pa
T03D3792:68b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du bsam gtan dang snyoms par

T03D3792:68b-23: pa'i khams su bdag nyid la kun du btags nas

T03D3792:68b-29: lan du gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T03D3792:68b-31: sems rtse gcig pa stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
T03D3792:68b-32: 'dzin gyi bsam gtan tsam yid la byed pas gnas
T03D3792:68b-33: te / dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo bskyed na ste /
T03D3792:68b-34: sems can la ltos pa med par des mngon par 'dod pa'i don la dmigs pa spangs pa ni /
T03D3792:68b-35: mnyam par ma bzhag par gyur pa ni dmigs pa nyes pa yin pa'i phyir sems rgod pa'o //
T03D3792:68b-36: theg pa chen po las sems phyi rol du gyur pas na sems g-yengs gyur pa'o //
T03D3792:68b-37: de lta bu ni sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams te /

T03D3792:69a-0: dgongs pa yin gyi mnyam par gzhag @69a * //

T03D3792:69a-2: mnyam par gzhag pa thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs
T03D3792:69a-3: yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //

T03D3792:69a-6: ma yin te 'o na ci zhe na mnyam par
T03D3792:69a-7: gzhag pa thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs yin no

T03D3792:69a-10: gzhan yang sgyu ma lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi
T03D3792:69a-11: sems can rjes su 'dzin pa la dgongs pas gzugs
T03D3792:69a-12: la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la mngon
T03D3792:69a-14: dgra bcom rang rgyal theg pa la 'dod pa'i sems dang bral te /
T03D3792:69a-16: snying rje'i snying po can gyi byang chub kyi sems de nyid dang /
T03D3792:69a-17: mngon par 'dod pa'i don las rtag tu nyams pa
T03D3792:69a-18: med pa 'di mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya'o
T03D3792:69a-19: // dpa' bo ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rgyal bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3792:69a-20: de ltar zhar la byung ba'i rtsod pa dang gzhan
T03D3792:69a-21: dang gzhan rgyud pa'i log par rtogs pa bas la

T03D3792:69a-24: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //

T03D3792:69a-26: mthong zhes bya dang bsgom pa zhes //

T03D3792:69a-28: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03D3792:69a-29: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dag dang //

T03D3792:69a-31: log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni //
T03D3792:69a-32: rtse mo'i mngon rtogs zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3792:69a-33: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa so so dang bsdus
T03D3792:69a-34: pa'i don rtogs pa thob pa rim par bya ste

T03D3792:69a-43: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rjes su dran pa drug dang /
T03D3792:69a-44: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid

T03D3792:69b-1: pa ste / chos rnam pa bcu gsum po de dag bsgom pa ni rnam par spyod pa'o //

T03D3792:69b-3: pa la sogs pa'i don ni dper na las ngan

T03D3792:76a-17: sdug bsngal la sogs pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod cing sel bar byed do //
T03D3792:76a-18: longs spyod kyi rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas rgyas
T03D3792:76a-19: pa ni rgya che ba thob nas byang chub sems
T03D3792:76a-20: dpa' spyad pa spyod par byed de /
T03D3792:76a-21: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can sbyin pas byang
T03D3792:76a-22: chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la bkod
T03D3792:76a-24: de bzhin du dri ma med pa la gnas pas
T03D3792:76a-25: ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'i skyon thams cad dang bral
T03D3792:76a-26: bas ji skad bstan pa'i tshul khrims kyis dud 'gro'i
T03D3792:76a-27: 'gro ba du ma sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can gyi
T03D3792:76a-28: ngo bo dang / mi khom pa brgyad spong bar byed cing /
T03D3792:76a-29: de yis mi nyid la sogs pa dal 'byor khyad
T03D3792:76a-30: par can gyi don byed pa rtag tu rnyed do
T03D3792:76a-31: // 'od byed pa la gnas pas ni gnod sems
T03D3792:76a-32: thams cad bral ba'i bzod pas gzugs bzang ste mtshan
T03D3792:76a-33: la sogs pas brgyan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:76a-36: thob par 'gyur te gser dang 'dra ba'i phyir gser mdog yid du 'ong ba'i phyir sdug pa'o //
T03D3792:76a-37: lta bas chog mi shes pa'i phyir 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3792:76a-38: 'od 'phro ba la gnas pas ni le lo thams
T03D3792:76a-39: cad dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ni dkar po'i
T03D3792:76a-41: ye shes kyi yul mtha' yas pas na mtha' yas te /
T03D3792:76a-42: sangs rgyas nyid kyi nor mchog bsags pa'i bdag nyid
T03D3792:76a-43: yin pa'i phyir rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur
T03D3792:76a-44: ro // sbyangs dka' ba la gnas pas ni rnam
T03D3792:76a-45: par g-yeng ba thams cad spangs pa'i bsam gtan gyis
T03D3792:76b-0: ni 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam par g-yeng @76b ba'i
T03D3792:76b-1: rgyur gyur pas nyes pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i
T03D3792:76b-2: phyir smad pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su 'dor
T03D3792:76b-3: ro // bar byed cing / khyad par can gyi bden pa rtogs pa dang /
T03D3792:76b-4: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rim
T03D3792:76b-5: pa ji lta ba bzhin du rigs dang mngon par
T03D3792:76b-7: dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed pa'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa'o //
T03D3792:76b-8: mngon du gyur pa la gnas pas ni shes rab
T03D3792:76b-9: 'chal pa thams cad spangs nas shes rab kyis ni
T03D3792:76b-10: chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma lta bu nyid la
T03D3792:76b-11: sogs pa'i bdag nyid du yongs su shes nas /
T03D3792:76b-12: khams gsum pa'i ngan song dang phyin ci log gis
T03D3792:76b-13: bcings pa de rnams ma lus pa las yang dag
T03D3792:76b-15: sprul pa'i sprin gyis dang por de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3792:76b-16: ltar chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che bskor nas
T03D3792:76b-17: phyis rim gyis chos bstan pas theg pa gsum 'dzin
T03D3792:76b-18: du bcug ste / sems can gyi 'jig rten phyin
T03D3792:76b-19: ci log gi sdug bsngal spong ba la 'god do
T03D3792:76b-20: du bcug ste / // ring du song ba la
T03D3792:76b-21: gnas pas ni thabs kyi stobs kyis sbyin pa la
T03D3792:76b-22: sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs
T03D3792:76b-24: mi g-yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3792:76b-25: smon lam gyi mthus ni gser la sogs pa'i rang
T03D3792:76b-26: bzhin gyi sa gzhi can du ba sgrubs nas snod
T03D3792:76b-27: kyi 'jig rten yongs su dag pa dang /
T03D3792:76b-28: bkres pa la sogs pa med pas bcud kyi 'jig
T03D3792:76b-29: rten gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
T03D3792:76b-31: de bzhin du legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pas
T03D3792:76b-32: ni stobs kyi mthus sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas
T03D3792:76b-33: nyid la bkod pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang yongs
T03D3792:76b-35: de bzhin du sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin la
T03D3792:76b-36: gnas pas ni ye shes kyi stobs kyis rgyun du
T03D3792:76b-37: chos bstan pas chos kyi rigs dang /
T03D3792:76b-38: de bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems
T03D3792:76b-39: dpa' gzhan dang gzhan sgrub pas dge 'dun gyi rigs
T03D3792:76b-41: de bzhin du rim pas bcu gcig kun du 'od
T03D3792:76b-42: sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs pas ni bag chags
T03D3792:76b-43: dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs nas chos
T03D3792:76b-44: thams cad kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i chos nyid
T03D3792:76b-45: thugs su chud pa 'dzin du 'jug go //
T03D3792:77a-0: de ltar yum rgya cher bstan nas yun ring du gnas @77a * //
T03D3792:77a-1: bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3792:77a-2: 'gro ba'i nad gso zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3792:77a-3: dper na gzhi dang mtshan nyid la phul du byung
T03D3792:77a-4: bar mkhas pa la 'gro ba'i nad gso byed pa
T03D3792:77a-5: sman pa'i mchog gyur pa zhes brjod do //
T03D3792:77a-6: de dang 'dra bar de ltar brjod do //
T03D3792:77a-7: don dang ldan pa'i ming btags pa ni sems bskyed
T03D3792:77a-8: pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rin po che brtsegs
T03D3792:77a-9: pa'i phyir rin chen sdud pa'o //
T03D3792:77a-10: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir lam mo //
T03D3792:77a-11: tshigs bcad du bsdebs nas bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3792:77a-12: lam ni sems can kun gyis bsgom pa'i man ngag
T03D3792:77a-13: ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su thob pa ni
T03D3792:77a-15: bya zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo
T03D3792:77a-16: la sogs pa la yongs su gtod pa yin par
T03D3792:77a-18: de ltar 'phags pa stong phrag brgya pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3792:77a-19: de bsgom pa'i man ngag gi rim pa 'di la mngon par yid ches par bya ste /
T03D3792:77a-20: 'di ltar dang po re zhig gnas yid du 'ong
T03D3792:77a-21: bar byas pa'i phyogs su ston par mdzad pa'i bcom
T03D3792:77a-22: ldan 'das sh'akya'i rgyal po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs
T03D3792:77a-23: nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang
T03D3792:77a-24: ldan pa la ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa
T03D3792:77a-25: la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sangs rgyas dang
T03D3792:77a-26: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas yongs su bskor
T03D3792:77a-28: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas pas lus drang por bsrangs te /
T03D3792:77a-29: mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T03D3792:77a-30: lce rkan la sbyar nas mig sna gong du gtad de /
T03D3792:77a-31: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du dmigs te /
T03D3792:77a-32: de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3792:77a-33: pa'i tshul bdag med pa gsal bar byed pa'i man
T03D3792:77a-34: ngag mnos la rtsa ba'i sems kyis ming dang mtshan
T03D3792:77a-35: ma la dmigs nas de nyid kyi tshig gi bye
T03D3792:77a-36: brag dang / le'u la sogs pa'i dbye ba la
T03D3792:77a-37: rjes su spyod pa'i sems kyis rnam par dpyad de
T03D3792:77a-38: brag dang / / de nas mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3792:77a-39: brgyad kyi gnas skabs dbye ba'i grangs rtsi ba dang
T03D3792:77a-40: brag dang / / / mngon par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin so sor nges par 'jal ba dang /
T03D3792:77a-42: skur ba 'debs pa med par dpyod pa dang /
T03D3792:77b-0: mngon sum dang rjes su @77b dpag pa'i tshad mas brtags pa'i phyir so sor rtog pa nyid do //
T03D3792:77b-1: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rnam pa bzhir rnam par dpyad de /
T03D3792:77b-2: yi ge yang sil bu dang bsdus pa'i rim pa
T03D3792:77b-3: ji lta ba bzhin du don med pa dang don
T03D3792:77b-4: dang bcas pa nyid kyis rnam pa de gnyis la
T03D3792:77b-5: rnam par dpyod pa'i phyir rnam par dpyod pa'i sems
T03D3792:77b-6: so // de'i tshe rnam par dpyad pa'i rgyu mtshan
T03D3792:77b-7: gyis 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni rmongs pa'o zhes
T03D3792:77b-8: nges par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis nges par bzung nas
T03D3792:77b-9: so // / ji lta ba bzhin gyi rnam par
T03D3792:77b-10: dpyad pa nyid kyi don mtshan ma la dmigs pa
T03D3792:77b-11: rtsa ba'i sems su bsdus pa'i sems kyis bcug nas
T03D3792:77b-12: so // / / bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3792:77b-13: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dud pa ni 'dun
T03D3792:77b-14: so // / / pa'i sems so // shes rab
T03D3792:77b-15: kyi mig gis sgyu ma lta bu las chos thams
T03D3792:77b-16: cad las yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas
T03D3792:77b-17: ma gzigs pas rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T03D3792:77b-18: de la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa nyid do //
T03D3792:77b-19: de yang rang dang spyi'i mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa'o //
T03D3792:77b-20: des don du gnyer bar bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir smon pa med pa nyid do //
T03D3792:77b-21: yang de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par grol ba'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T03D3792:77b-22: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pas chos nyid
T03D3792:77b-23: yongs su mi shes pa de dag phyin ci log
T03D3792:77b-24: gis bcings pas / 'khor ba na spyod pa'i 'ching
T03D3792:77b-25: ba dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams nges par
T03D3792:77b-26: legs pa la 'god pa'i snying rje chen po bsgom
T03D3792:77b-27: gis bcings pas / par bya'o // de la ting nge 'dzin la le lo dang /
T03D3792:77b-28: dmigs pa la brjed pa dang /
T03D3792:77b-33: skyon drug po de dag gnas skabs ji lta bas
T03D3792:77b-34: skyes pa na de'i gnyen po 'du byed brgyad ji
T03D3792:77b-35: lta ba bzhin du bsten par bya ste /
T03D3792:77b-36: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan la mngon
T03D3792:77b-37: par yid ches ba'i mtshan nyid dad pas rnal 'byor
T03D3792:77b-38: pa la 'dun pa yang dag par skye'o //
T03D3792:77b-39: 'dun pa de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
T03D3792:77b-40: de nas brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis lus dang sems shin tu sbyang bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:77b-41: lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas le lo ldog par 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:77b-42: de ltar na dad pa la sogs pa bzhis le lo spong bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:77b-43: dmigs pa brjed pa'i gnyen por ni dran pa nyid de /
T03D3792:78a-1: pa'i dmigs pa la gnas so //
T03D3792:78a-2: shes bzhin ni bying rgod kyi gnyen po ste /
T03D3792:78a-3: de nyid kyis dga' ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas la
T03D3792:78a-4: sogs pa'i yon tan yid la byed pas bying ba
T03D3792:78a-5: spong ngo // yang dag par skyo ba'i dngos po
T03D3792:78a-6: mi rtag pa la sogs pa yid la byed pa
T03D3792:78a-7: la sogs pas rgod pa spong bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3792:78a-8: bying rgod zhi bar byed pa'i dus su mi rtsol
T03D3792:78a-9: na yang skyon yin pas sems pa la goms par
T03D3792:78a-10: bya'o // bying rgod zhi ba na gang gi tshe
T03D3792:78a-11: sems dmigs pa las rab tu mi g-yo ba na
T03D3792:78a-12: mngon par 'du byed pa la zhugs par gyur na
T03D3792:78a-13: de'i tshe rtsol ba skyon yin no //
T03D3792:78a-14: de la sems rnam par g-yeng ba de'i gnyen po btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T03D3792:78a-15: rim pa de ltar bsgoms nas langs te sngar sdud
T03D3792:78a-16: par byed par rang gi lha rdo rje 'chang gi
T03D3792:78a-17: gzugs su mos par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3792:78a-18: la sogs pa spyan drangs nas /
T03D3792:78a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pas chos kyi sbyin pa byin te /
T03D3792:78a-20: de dag thams cad mngon par ma zhen pa'i rnal
T03D3792:78a-21: 'byor gyis sems can thams cad kyi don du bla
T03D3792:78a-22: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3792:78a-24: de bzhin du thun mtshams bzhir bsgrub par bya'o //
T03D3792:78a-25: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:78a-26: pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu
T03D3792:78a-29: // / rnal 'byor mkhas pa 'gas kyang sngon chad yum 'di'i bsgrub pa rig pas ma rtogs pa //
T03D3792:78a-30: gti mug mun nag smag ni ma lus bsal ba'i mgon pos mkhyen nas gsungs pa yi //
T03D3792:78a-31: rigs pa legs ldan tshig gis de bshad pa las bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa //
T03D3792:78a-32: des ni yon tan rin chen bsdus ldan 'di ni
T03D3792:78a-33: 'gro bas myur du thob par shog / gang zhig
T03D3792:78a-35: de yi bsdus don rab gsal ba //
T03D3792:78a-36: shes rab pha rol phyin bshad pa //
T03D3792:78a-37: rdzogs la rtogs par sla ba yin //
T03D3792:78a-38: brgyad pa'i sdeb sbyor nges bcings pa'i //
T03D3792:78a-39: tshigs su bcad pa yongs rtsis na //
T03D3792:78a-40: phye na stong phrag gnyis dag dang //
T03D3792:78a-41: brgya yis 'di lhag shes par bya //
T03D3792:78a-42: yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad
T03D3792:78a-43: pa'i dka' 'grel rtogs par sla ba zhes bya ba
T03D3792:78a-44: / slob dpon chen po seng ge bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3792:78a-46: // / bal yul gyi pandi ta dze ta hang du sh'anti bha dra'i zhal snga nas dang /
